The Orlando Magic ( 1 - 1 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 2 - 12 ) 115 - 116 on Saturday . Philadelphia was coming off a depressing buzzer - beating loss to the Utah Jazz on Friday in which Trey Burke sank a long three - point field goal as time expired . Nikola Vucevic had a monster game , recording 27 points on 10 - of - 15 shooting and 13 rebounds in 34 minutes . He also had two steals and two blocks in 34 minutes . Nikola Vucevic posted a double - double of 27 points and 13 rebounds in 38 minutes , and the Sixers shot a woeful 46 percent from the field and 55 percent from beyond the arc . Though the Sixers shot better than the Magic from the field ( 46 percent ) , they also allowed the 76ers to stay in the game by giving up 31 easy points off of 14 turnovers , pointing to their greatest weakness Saturday and the likely reason why they lost the game . Philadelphia will host the Washington Wizards on Friday , as the Magic will travel to Orlando to take on the Magic , while the 76ers will begin their two - game road trip the Los Angeles Lakers against the Denver Nuggets . The Sixers ' next game is at home Saturday against the Chicago Bulls . The Sixers ' next game is on the road Monday against the Washington Wizards . The 76ers ' next game is on the road Saturday against the Cleveland Cavaliers . The Magic 's next game is on the road Saturday against the New York Knicks .
The Philadelphia 76ers ( 10 - 7 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 7 - 8 ) 113 - 107 on Tuesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . The Sixers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 38 - 24 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 47 percent from the floor and just 18 percent from beyond the arc . The Sixers also secured a 41 - 39 rebounding advantage , helping push them to a convincing 15 - point victory . The Sixers were led by Joel Embiid , who went 7 - for - 20 from the field and 8 - for - 9 from the free throw line to finish with a team - high of 23 points , while also adding seven rebounds and three steals in just 26 minutes . He 's now averaging 16 points and 7 rebounds per game on the season . Rudy Gobert also had a big game , finishing with 23 points ( 7 - 20 FG , 8 - 9 FT ) and seven rebounds . He was able to get to the free throw line nine times , and converted on 8 - of - 9 . Coming just shy of a double - double , Rudy Gobert had 12 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) and 10 rebounds , marking his first double - double of the year . He 's now averaging 13 points and 5 rebounds on the season . The only other Nugget to reach double figures in points was Ricky Rubio , who recorded 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 9 FT ) and four assists in 31 minutes . The points were a new season - high for the Sixers . Jimmy Butler led the way for the 76ers , going 12 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points . He also added three rebounds and seven assists , as he was able to get to the free throw line 5 times and converted on a perfect 4 - of - 7 . He 's now combined for 63 points in the last two games , as he continues to stay hot from the field . J.J. Redick had a strong showing as well , finishing with 16 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) , two rebounds and one assist in 34 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of two games , combining for 44 points and 8 rebounds over that span . Ricky Rubio chipped in with 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 9 FT ) , four rebounds and four assists in 31 minutes . The 31 points were a new season - high for him , while the double - double was his first since the end of January . The Sixers ' next game will be at home against the Boston Celtics on Friday , while the Jazz will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Friday .
The Philadelphia 76ers ( 17 - 8 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 13 - 9 ) 103 - 95 on Sunday at the Wells Fargo Center in Memphis . The 76ers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Grizzlies 26 - 25 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went 42 percent from the floor and a meager 39 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the 76ers finished with a 44 - 35 rebounding advantage , helping push them to a convincing 19 - point victory . The 76ers ' backcourt of Jaren and Mike Conley did most of the damage to the Sixers . Butler went 7 - for - 17 from the field and 0 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding three rebounds and two blocked shots . The 24 points were a new season - high for him and a nice surprise for the Sixers , as he 's averaging only 14 points per game so far this season . Joel Embiid also had a big game , recording 15 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) and 14 rebounds in 38 minutes . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 19 points and 10 rebounds . Notching a double - double of his own , Joel Embiid recorded 15 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) and 14 rebounds . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Garrett Temple , who came off the bench for 12 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) . The Grizzlies ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Grizzlies will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Saturday .

The Pacers ' backcourt of Victor Oladipo and Bojan Bogdanovic did most of the damage to the Pacers . Embiid went 13 - for - 22 from the field and 1 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding 21 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 42 points and 16 rebounds over his last two games . He 's also had at least two blocks in each of his last three games . Coming off the bench , Ben Simmons was also very efficient . He went 7 - for - 15 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding nine rebounds and four assists . The four steals matched a season - high for him , while the double - double was his first since December seventeenth . While he did n't do too much on the offensive side of the ball with only eight points ( 5 - 16 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , Darren Collison did everything he could to keep the 76ers close , going 7 - for - 15 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 22 points . It was his eighteenth start of the season , as he 's now pushed his season averages to 16 points and 3 assists per game on the season . The Pacers also saw a huge contribution from Ben Simmons off the bench , as he went 7 - for - 15 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 18 points . It was a nice surprise for the Sixers , as he 's only averaging 16 points per game so far this season . He finished with 14 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , one rebound and nine assists in 31 minutes . The Hawks were led by the duo of Kevin Huerter and Jimmy Butler . Huerter shot 11 - for - 17 from the field , five - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 29 points , to go along with three rebounds and three assists , while Simmons finished with 23 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 1 - 8 3Pt , 4 - 2 FT ) of his own , to go along with three rebounds and two assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 47 points and 15 rebounds over his last two games . J.J. Redick had a strong showing as well . He went 7 - for - 21 from the field and 4 - for - 14 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while adding two assists in 35 minutes . He had a very poor showing in Friday 's game against the Pacers , shooting just 21 percent ( 2 - 9 FG ) from the field , so it was good to see him get back on track Tuesday . It was his first double - double of the year , setting a season - high for rebounds . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the Washington Wizards on Wednesday , while the Sixers will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Philadelphia 76ers ( 36 - 20 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 28 - 28 ) 143 - 120 , Tuesday night at the Wells Fargo Center . The 76ers came out of the gate with a 39 - 40 first quarter lead and never looking back . The Sixers led by as many as 34 points in the third quarter , but the Sixers woke up in the second quarter and did not look back out - scoring 26 - 26 to tie the game at 100 - 98 and heading into the fourth . The Sixers were able to cut into the lead late , but the Sixers were led by Kyle Kuzma , who put up 39 points ( 14 - 21 FG , 5 - 8 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , along with three rebounds and one assist , in 32 minutes . LeBron James led the Lakers in scoring with 18 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt ) , along with 10 rebounds and nine assists , in 33 minutes . JaVale McGee was solid in 26 minutes off the bench , as he finished with 21 points ( 10 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) , 13 rebounds , one steal and one block , in 26 minutes . Philly shot 52 percent from the field and 37 percent from long range , while assisting on 33 - of - 42 free throws . Tobias Harris was the high - point man for the Lakers , with 22 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , along with six rebounds , in 29 minutes off the bench . Brandon Ingram finished with 19 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 7 - 7 FT ) , four rebounds and four assists , in 34 minutes , while Brandon Ingram tallied 19 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) , four rebounds and four assists , in 34 minutes . T.J. McConnell chipped in 13 points to go along with three assists , one steal and one block . Next up for the Sixers is a trip to Golden State for a game Wednesday night , where they will look to break their current four - game losing streak .

This was a game that was tight throughout , as there were nine ties and 18 lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Bucks recording 33 assists to 14 turnovers , while the Wizards committed 24 turnovers to just 34 assists . The Bucks shot 60 percent from the field , while holding the Wizards to just 52 percent shooting . Washington was led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , who tallied 43 points , six rebounds , four assists and three steals in the win . The Chicago Bulls defeated the Washington Wizards 126 - 120 at United Center on Monday . The Bulls came into this game extremely shorthanded and it was simply too much to overcome . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Bulls , as they led by at least seven points for the entirety of the second half , while holding a double - digit lead for the majority of it . Defense was key for the Bulls , as they held the Wizards to 47 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than Washington , despite committing five less turnovers . The Wizards ( 30 - 42 ) had a tough task here against a hungry Bulls team and they simply did n't have enough to compete in this game . Jabari Parker was the player of the game , accumulating 28 points , 13 rebounds and five assists on 12 - of - 18 from the field . Bradley Beal was second on the team , finishing with 27 points , seven rebounds and seven assists . Tomas Satoransky recorded a 16 - point , 5 - rebound double - double . Cristiano Felicio was a nice spark off the bench for Washington , amassing 15 points and six rebounds . The Wizards ( 21 - 52 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and they came out of the All-Star break with some fury . Bradley Beal continued his great form , as he accumulated 27 points , seven rebounds , seven assists and three steals on 7 - of - 19 shooting . Bradley Beal finished second on the team , collecting 27 points , seven rebounds and seven assists . Cristiano Felicio came off the bench to record an 15 - point , 6 - rebound double - double .
The Toronto Raptors ( 54 - 23 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 21 - 56 ) 124 - 101 on Monday at the United Center in Toronto . The Raptors came out and had a strong first half defensively , out - scoring the Bulls 26 - 28 to end the first half . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Bulls went 42 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Raptors were also able to force the Bulls into 31 turnovers , while only committing 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Raptors were led by Serge Ibaka , who went 10 - for - 16 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , while also adding 12 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 62 points and 60 rebounds over his last two games . Fred VanVleet was also a huge factor off the bench , recording 18 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and an assist over 32 minutes . It was his first double - double since the end of January , so it was good to see him get back on track Wednesday . Replacing Ryan Arcidiacono as the starting center , Jeremy Lin posted 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and three assists in 24 minutes . For the Bulls , Fred VanVleet continued his strong play as well , led the Bulls with 23 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 10 rebounds in 33 minutes . He 's now averaging 15 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Norman Luwawu-Cabarrot shot 6 - for - 11 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 15 points . He had only reached double figures in points twice this season , so it was a nice surprise for the Bulls . Jeremy Lin was the other Bulls ' player to reach double figures , finishing with 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and three assists . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday , while the Bulls will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Boston Celtics ( 38 - 25 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 25 - 37 ) 107 - 96 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Boston . The Celtics were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards went 40 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Celtics also out - rebounded the Wizards 46 - 53 , only furthering their advantage in this one . The Celtics were led by Bradley Beal , who shot 12 - for - 23 from the field and 4 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 29 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and a pair of assists in 39 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 52 points and 39 rebounds over his last two games . Morris on the other hand recorded 17 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 3 - 11 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) and nine rebounds , notching his second double - double in as many games . He 's now averaging 17 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Kyrie Irving also had a strong showing , posting 13 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) and 12 assists in 34 minutes . Often criticized for his shooting , it was good to see him shoot over 100 percent from the field at the point . Marcus Smart was also a big factor in the win , as he finished with 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 4 - 4 3Pt ) , two rebounds and two assists . He had gone a combined 4 - for - 18 from the field over his last two games , so it was good to see him get things turned around . Jeff Green added 15 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and four rebounds as well . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Wizards will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .

The Heat also secured a 40 - 42 rebounding advantage , helping push them to a win . The Heat 's backcourt of Dwyane Wade and Dwyane Wade did most of the damage for the Heat . Wade went 10 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , while also adding five assists and two blocked shots . The 23 points were a new season - high for him and a nice surprise for the Heat , as he 's averaging only 14 points per game so far this season . Justise Winslow also had a solid showing . He went 8 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while adding five rebounds as well . The only other Hawks player to reach double figures was Dion Waiters , who had 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , three rebounds and two assists off the bench . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday , while the Hawks will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

It was his second impressive performance in a row , as he 's combined for 41 points and 39 rebounds over his last two games . The only other Bull to reach double figures in points was Ben Simmons , who scored 16 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) in 21 minutes . The Heat 's next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday , while the Sixers will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Wednesday . The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Chicago Bulls , 135 - 106 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday . The Hornets ( 3 - 3 ) braced themselves for an offensive void when they lost Kemba Walker to a finger injury in preseason , as he was slated to miss a minimum of six weeks . However , the standout forward had missed three games with a back injury , which was notably the second and final member of the starting lineup . While Charlotte was finally able to pull away in the second half , the dynamic duo of Kemba Walker and Jabari Parker stepped up with a pair of 30 - point efforts . Kemba Walker 's 30 - point , seven - rebound , seven - assist triple - double led the way for the Hornets , with the dynamic point guard going to the line a game - high 3 times and converting 3 of 10 attempts from behind the arc . Parker was right behind him with 19 points of his own , which he supplemented with a pair of rebounds and a steal . Nicolas Batum was the only other member of the first unit to hit double digits in the scoring column , but he did haul in eight rebounds , dish out five assists and recorded two steals . Malik Monk led the bench with 10 points , two boards , two assists and two steals . The Bulls were led by Zach LaVine , who went for a game - high 20 points on 6 - of - 16 shooting , and who added four assists and three rebounds . Cameron Payne tallied 15 points , two rebounds , three assists and two steals in a reserve role as well . Cody Zeller totaled 14 points , six rebounds , an assist and a block . Nicolas Batum compiled 10 points , five assists , eight rebounds , two steals and a block . Jeremy Lamb led the second unit with 10 points , two rebounds and a steal , while Malik Monk led the bench with 13 points , two rebounds , three assists and two steals . The Hornets head back home to face off with the Houston Rockets on Monday night , while the Bulls remain home to face off with the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday evening .

Charlotte has won four straight games , and while the wins have come during an easy part of their schedule ( Sixers , Jazz , Nuggets , Hornets ) , the talking heads have tried to fit the narrative of Lance Stephenson ( groin ) sitting out as the reason for the Hornets ' success . Stephenson has missed the last four games , coinciding with the Hornets ' resurgence , and while they have no doubt played remarkably better of late , putting all the blame on one player is misleading . Kemba Walker led with the way Tuesday , putting up a team - high 18 points in 30 minutes . Charlotte will go on the road to face the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday . The Hornets are tied with the Brooklyn Nets for the eighth and final playoff spot in the East , but they also have the Pacers , Celtics and Pistons within two games of them , fighting for the final playoff spot . Milwaukee is seven games behind the Hornet and Nets , putting them all - but out of the playoff conversation this late in the season . They 've lost five straight , and five of their last seven . Giannis Antetokounmpo continues to be the lone bright spot for the Hornets . He put up 20 points and 13 rebounds in 40 minutes . The Bucks will stay home to host the Toronto Raptors on Sunday . Milwaukee has lost three straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Bucks will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Bucks have the right guys to build a winning team around . Los Angeles has won four straight games , and while the wins have come during an easy part of their schedule ( Sixers , Jazz , Nuggets , Lakers ) , the talking heads have tried to fit the narrative of Lance Stephenson ( groin ) sitting out as the reason for the Lakers ' success . Stephenson has missed the last four games , coinciding with the Lakers ' resurgence , and while they have no doubt played remarkably better of late , putting all the blame on one player is misleading . LeBron James led the way for the Timberwolves with the victory . He finished with 24 points , nine assists and five rebounds in 43 minutes . Brandon Ingram put up a 20 - point , 5 - rebound double - double in 37 minutes , and Brandon Ingram put up a game - high 31 points and five assists in 37 minutes . The Lakers will go on the road to face the Brooklyn Nets on Friday . Minnesota has lost two straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Timberwolves will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Timberwolves are winless so far this season . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 14 turnovers , while committing just 10 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 53 points and 16 rebounds over his last two games . J.J. Redick had a strong showing as well . He went 8 - for - 13 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding six assists . He 's now averaging 13 points and 6 rebounds on the year . It was his eighteenth start of the season , as he 's now pushed his season averages to 8 points and 3 assists on the year . Butler had 14 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and four rebounds , while Iwundu with 17 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and six assists . The Magic led the whole way in this one , holding the Knicks to only 33 percent shooting from the field , while shooting 57 percent from the field . Evan Fournier followed up with 19 points , while Evan Fournier chipped in 19 points , six assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Knicks shot only 46 percent from the field and gave up 14 turnovers . They will wrap up their current five - game road trip with a contest in Atlanta on Saturday . New York has now dropped its second game in as many nights after a tough 107 - 103 loss in overtime on Friday night at Indiana . Wesley Fournier led the way with 19 points , six rebounds , six assists and one steal . D.J . Augustin also added 12 points in 24 minutes off the bench . The Knicks were out - rebounded 42 - 42 but committed only 14 turnovers , three of which were charged to Kevin Knox . Up next , the Magic host the West-leading Warriors on Monday . New York hits to road to take on the Wizards in Washington , also on Sunday . The Knicks return home for a Friday matchup against the Kings .
The Indiana Pacers ( 15 - 10 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 12 - 14 ) 112 - 90 on Sunday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Pacers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 28 - 25 in the first quarter alone . The Pacers were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 40 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from beyond the arc . The Pacers also out - rebounded the Magic 53 - 47 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Pacers were led by Bojan Bogdanovic , who shot 10 - for - 18 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 26 points , while also adding three rebounds and two blocked shots . It marked his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 56 points and 14 rebounds over his last two games . He 's had a nice stretch of two games , combining for 56 points and 18 rebounds over that span . The Pacers ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Magic will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

Nearly recording a triple - double , Andre Drummond finished with 13 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) , 17 rebounds and two blocked shots , as he was a big reason the Nuggets were able to sneak out the win . He went 5 - for - 7 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the free throw line to score 10 points , while adding 12 rebounds and a blocked shot as well . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Pistons will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Denver Nuggets ( 53 - 26 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 50 - 29 ) 119 - 110 on Friday . Denver came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldn ’ t hold off a bad Nuggets team . The key for Denver was their shooting , as they shot 51 percent from the field , 90 percent from the free - throw line and 26 percent from three - point range . They also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 39 boards to the Blazers 40 . This marks the third - straight loss for the Trail Blazers and skeptics wonder if this is regression finally hitting this surprise team . Paul Millsap had a great game , as he tallied 25 points , seven rebounds and two blocks in the defeat . Jamal Murray also had a nice game off the bench , as he contributed 23 points , four rebounds and six assists off the bench . This is a very talented team and they are still feared no matter how bad their record looks . The Nuggets have now won two - straight and they 'll look to add to that winning streak on Wednesday in a road matchup with the Dallas Mavericks . The Nuggets have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and they came out of the All-Star break on a high note . They were led by a fantastic performance from Paul Millsap , who tallied 25 points , seven rebounds and two assists in the win . Nikola Jokic also played well , as he amassed 22 points , 13 rebounds and nine assists . The Nuggets have a quick turnaround , as they play the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday in their next game .

The Indiana Pacers ( 11 - 6 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 8 - 9 ) 121 - 94 on Monday at Time Warner Cable Arena in Indiana . The Pacers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 32 - 19 right away in the first quarter . To go along with the quick start , the Pacers also shot the ball well , going 53 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 49 percent from the floor and just 44 percent from beyond the arc . The Pacers also forced the Jazz into 18 turnovers , while committing only nine of their own . The Pacers were led by Bojan Bogdanovic , who shot 9 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding two rebounds in 30 minutes . It was a new season - high in points for him , while also marking his first double - double since his first game of the season back in November . Bojan Bogdanovic was also a huge factor in the win , scoring 21 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt ) and grabbing a pair of steals . He 's now scored 21 or more points in three out of his last four games , as he 's been a big reason for the Pacers ' success this season . Domantas Sabonis was a huge spark off the bench , as he posted 19 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) and seven rebounds . It was his first double - double of the year , setting a season - high for rebounds . Darren Collison chipped in with nine points ( 4 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) and seven assists . The Pacers ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Jazz will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Pacers got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 24 - 31 right away in the first quarter . The Pacers also out - rebounded the Kings 52 - 43 , giving them even more of an advantage . It was a season - high in points for Hield , who had n't reached the 33 - point mark yet this season , so he 'll look to keep his confidence high going into the playoffs . Bojan Bogdanovic also had a strong showing and finished with 18 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) and two assists over 28 minutes . He 's now pushed his season averages to 13 points and 4 rebounds on the year . Both Tyreke Evans and Myles Turner reached double figures as well with 10 and 11 points respectively . The Kings were led by Thaddeus Young , who went 7 - for - 13 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also grabbing nine rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 54 points and 13 rebounds over his last two games . Bogdanovic , on the other hand , went 8 - for - 20 from the field and 1 - for - 12 from beyond the arc to score 18 points . It was a season - high in points for him , as he 's only reached double figures in points four other times this season . Darren Bogdanovic also had a solid showing , posting 14 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and six assists in 32 minutes . Myles Turner had a strong showing as well , posting nine points ( 4 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt ) and a game - high of 13 rebounds . The Pacers ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Lakers on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .

The Cavaliers have now won five of their last seven , while the Cavaliers have been eliminated from playoff contention . Victor Oladipo added 12 points and five rebounds of his own , while Victor Oladipo scored 12 points on 4 - of - 15 shooting . The Cavs were led by Rodney Hood , who scored 17 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) to go with two assists , six rebounds and two steals in 24 minutes . Thaddeus Young was the only other Cavaliers ' starter to score in double figures , scoring 13 points ( 6 - 13 FG ) and grabbing nine rebounds in 24 minutes off the bench . Alec Burks ( 14 ) and Matthew Dellavedova ( 10 ) round out the Pacers who scored in double figures . The win pushes Cleveland to just a half - game behind the Thunder for third place in the Eastern Conference standings with just three games left to play for the third spot in the Eastern Conference .

The key for the Magic was protecting the ball , as they committed just nine turnovers , while forcing the Pacers to commit 11 . Orlando shot 51 percent from the field , with Indiana shooting just 55 percent on their end . The rebounding was a huge factor as well , as the Magic recorded 41 rebounds to the Pacers 36 . Indiana has been throttling teams , but this was easily their worst offensive performance of the year . They played very well here , as they shot 51 percent from the field , 79 percent from the free - throw line and 36 percent from three - point range . Nikola Vucevic led the team in scoring , as he totaled 27 points and eight rebounds on 11 - for - 19 shooting . Evan Fournier also played well , as he amassed 23 points and five rebounds . Terrence Ross was a nice spark off the bench , as he scored a career - high 23 points off the bench . Up next for Orlando is a matchup with the Milwaukee Bucks on Monday . Orlando continues to thrive at home and this sort of win shows how scary they can be . The best player for Indiana on this night was Nikola Vucevic , who tallied 27 points , eight rebounds , three assists and two blocks in the win . Darren Collison also had a nice game off the bench , as he accumulated 19 points , eight assists and five rebounds in the win . Up next for the Magic is a date with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday .

In fact , the Raptors had a 23 - point lead at half and were able to rest their starters for long periods of this game . Toronto shot 49 percent from the field , 64 percent from the free - throw line and 47 percent from three - point range . The Raptors shot just 38 percent from the field and 20 percent from three - point range . The ball movement was huge as well , with Toronto dishing out 33 assists to just 14 turnovers . The Raptors also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 45 boards to the Celtics 47 . This marks the third - straight loss for the Celtics and skeptics wonder if this is regression finally hitting this surprise team . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 40 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went just 45 percent from the floor and a meager 23 percent from beyond the arc . He continues to be the team 's most consistent player , as he 's averaging 20 points and 5 rebounds over his last three games . He 's now averaging 16 points and 7 rebounds on the year . He had only reached double figures two other times this season , so it was good to see him turn things around . The Portland Trail Blazers ( 23 - 17 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 22 - 16 ) 110 - 101 on Tuesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Portland . The Trail Blazers came out firing in this one , out - scoring the Rockets 30 - 30 in the first quarter alone . The Trail Blazers were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Rockets went just 46 percent from the floor and a meager 34 percent from beyond the arc . The Trail Blazers also forced the Rockets into 12 turnovers , while committing just nine of their own . The Blazers ' backcourt of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum did most of the damage to the Rockets . Harden went 13 - for - 35 from the field and 5 - for - 17 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 38 points , while also adding seven assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 37 points and 37 rebounds over his last two games . He 's also had three blocks in each of his last four games , which bodes well for the Blazers as the playoffs begin . With the win , Nurkic also extended his streak to three games on the season , so it was good to see him have some success . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Evan Turner , who came off the bench to score 14 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) . He had only reached double figures in points twice this year , so it was a nice surprise for the Rockets . Clint Capela double - doubled with 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and 21 rebounds as well . The Blazers ' next game will be at home against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Rockets will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday .

McCollum did all he could to keep the Jazz hanging around , as he led the team with 30 points in the loss . It was a new season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Wizards , as he 's averaging just 15 points per game so far this season . He was able to get to the free throw line 6 times and converted on a perfect 4 - of - 6 . He 's really stepped it up lately , averaging 33 points over his last three games . He had only reached double figures in points twice this year , so it was a nice surprise for the Lakers . The Washington Wizards defeated the Indiana Pacers , 107 - 89 , at Verizon Center on Friday . The Wizards were expected to win this game easily against a shorthanded Pacers team , but they played some of their best defense of the season . In fact , they led for the entirety of the second half , while holding a double - digit lead for 20 of the final 24 minutes . Defense was key for Washington , as they held Indiana to 39 percent shooting , while forcing them to commit 15 turnovers . The Wizards ended up shooting 53 percent from the field , while holding the Pacers to just 39 percent from the field . A 39 - 24 differential in the paint was huge as well , as Washington dominated down low , winning the rebounding battle , 41 - 39 . The Pacers ( 32 - 29 ) have now won three - straight games , as the balance beam is evening up with their abundance of close losses . Bradley Beal was the star , as he led the Wizards with 25 points , six rebounds and six assists . Jeff Green was second on the team , providing 23 points and six assists off the bench . Thaddeus Young was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 13 points and seven rebounds . Indiana will look to keep rolling on Friday in a road matchup with the New York Knicks . Indiana ( 32 - 18 ) have been dominant at home this season and a win like this shows just how scary of a team they can be . Chasson Randle and Jordan McRae came off the bench to score 12 points a piece .

They were paced by Justin Holiday off the bench , putting up 27 points , 13 rebounds and three assists in 40 minutes . Josh Richardson scored a game - high 27 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting from the field and 2 - of - 9 shooting from beyond the arc , while Justin Holiday scored a career - high 27 points in 40 minutes off the bench . Miami has lost three straight , and in their last two games , they 've scored at least 118 points . Their offense is firing on all cylinders , and coach David Blatt is using unconventional lineups to get the work done . He 's regularly used Zach LaVine in the starting lineup . LaVine scored a game - high 24 points and pulled down four rebounds and dished out nine assists in 39 minutes . His backcourt mate , Jabari Parker , and Dwyane Wade each finished with double - doubles . Wade had 10 points in 24 minutes , and Whiteside recorded 10 rebounds , one assist , and four blocks . Miami has lost five of their last six , and the bleakness will be hard for them to overcome anytime soon as they 're currently trudging through a difficult part of their schedule . Playing without Iman Shumpert ( shoulder ) and J.R. Payne ( plantar fascitis ) on Sunday , the Bulls struggled , shooting just 37 percent from the field and 25 percent from beyond the arc . Hassan Whiteside led the way with an impressive double - double of 18 points and 10 rebounds in 22 minutes .
The Chicago Bulls ( 6 - 20 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 16 - 8 ) Monday 114 - 112 at the United Center in Chicago . It was a methodical , balanced approach for the Bulls , as five different players scoring in double figures allowed them to keep pace with and ultimately defeat the red - hot Thunder - who had won five games in a row coming into Monday night ’ s matchup . Chicago was led by Russell Westbrook , who recorded a triple - double of 24 points on 9 - of - 21 shooting , 17 assists and 17 rebounds in 35 minutes . It was the second time in the last four games that Westbrook has scored at least 25 points . Paul George managed to put together his best performance of the season , putting up 19 points on 6 - of - 16 shooting and seven assists in 36 minutes . Dennis Schroeder was the only other starter to score in double figures with 19 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) , five rebounds and three assists in 23 minutes , while Jerami Grant was the only other Thunder player to score in double figures with 13 points in 34 minutes , while Jerami Grant posted 13 points of his own in 34 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Bulls will head to Chicago Wednesday to take on the Bulls , while the Thunder will head home Friday and play the Bulls before going for the sixth game of a back - to - back set .

The Atlanta Hawks ( 15 - 32 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 11 - 37 ) 121 - 101 on Sunday at American Airlines Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 42 - 25 right away in the first quarter . The Bulls were the superior shooters , going 50 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Bulls went just 44 percent from the floor and a meager 31 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks were also able to force the Bulls into 18 turnovers , while only committing 17 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Hawks were led by the duo of John Collins and Zach LaVine in this one . LaVine went 6 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , while also adding eight rebounds and two assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 88 points and 29 rebounds over his last two games . Zach LaVine had a strong showing as well , finishing with 23 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) and four assists . It was a season - high in points for LaVine and arguably his best game of the season thus far . Zach LaVine also had a strong showing of his own , scoring 23 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) , while also adding four rebounds and four assists . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 29 points and 15 assists over his last two games . The Hawks also saw some solid contributions from their bench . Jeremy Lin had 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 3 FT ) and four assists , while Wayne Selden had 11 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) and two rebounds . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the Boston Celtics on Friday , while the Bulls will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Philadelphia 76ers ( 50 - 30 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 22 - 58 ) 116 - 96 on Friday . In a battle between two of the best defenses in the NBA , the Sixers were able to prevail with a much needed victory . They really turned it on in the second half , outscoring Chicago , 76 - 43 . Shooting was key for Philadelphia , as they shot 52 percent from the field and from three - point range . They also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 54 boards to the Bulls 38 . Chicago had to play this game in the second half of a back - to - back set and it was clear this shorthanded roster couldn ’ t muster up the energy to win . In fact , Chicago was missing Amir Johnson , who sat out with an ankle injury . Joel Embiid continued his recent stretch of play , as he is dealing with a sports hernia . Joel Embiid stepped up in his absence though , as he amassed 20 points , eight rebounds and five assists . J.J. Redick scored 23 points on an efficient 8 - of - 12 shooting . Philadelphia has a quick turnaround , as they play the Philadelphia 76ers on Monday in their next game . Philadelphia has been playing some great ball recently , but this was a baffling loss . Tobias Harris led the team with 20 points , while also snatching down eight rebounds in the loss . Tobias Harris also had a nice game off the bench , as he tallied 16 points , six rebounds and five assists . Philadelphia will look to build off this win when they take on the New York Knicks on Monday .

The Thunder were able to keep their playoff hopes alive with the win over the Cavs . The New Orleans Pelicans also came out with a win on Monday , so both the Thunder and Pelicans remain tied for the eighth and final projected playoff seed in the West . The Pelicans own the tiebreaker though , so in order for the Thunder to get into the playoffs , they 'll need a win of their own , as well as a Pelican 's loss on Monday in the finale . The Cavaliers , on the other hand , have locked up the fourth seed in the West , so they 'll look to continue to build their momentum with the playoffs on the verge of beginning . The Cavaliers have been eliminated from the playoffs for quite some time now , but the loss only helps their cause , as a worse record increases the potential for a higher landing spot for the 2015 NBA Draft . With the fourth worst record in the league , it 's almost a sure thing they 'll get a very high pick come draft day . These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows just which way they 're both headed . It was a wire - to - wire win for New Orleans , as they led by double - digits for the majority of the game , after a 28 - 26 first quarter . The Pelicans dominated down low , as they won the rebounding differential , 44 - 34 , and outscored the Cavaliers , 68 - 52 , in the paint . The Pelicans ( 18 - 22 ) have been one of the worst teams in the league over recent weeks and they came out of the All-Star break with some fury . Jordan Clarkson was the only bench player in double figures , as he dropped 23 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting . Julius Randle was the player of the game , as he totaled 22 points , 29 rebounds and eight assists on 6 - of - 12 shooting . Miami has won three straight games , and in their last two games , they 've done it without starting center Andrew Bogut who has been sidelined with tendinitis in his knee . David Lee ( hamstring ) is nearing a return but has yet to be cleared to return to action , and even when Lee does return , there does n't seem to be more than a marginal role off off the bench available to him . The Lakers will have a few days off before taking on the Oklahoma City Thunder on the road on Friday night .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 31 - 26 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 35 - 21 ) 123 - 112 at Staples Center on Saturday . The low scoring and poor shooting affair riddled both the Clippers and Celtics on Wednesday , as neither team broke 50 percent shooting as a unit . Matchup wise , the Clippers had the advantage in two places . One was behind Kyrie Irving , who had missed three straight games with a hamstring injury , and the back - and - forth affair came down to the final seconds , when Gordon Hayward proved to be too much for the rest of the game . Los Angeles dominated the third quarter , where they outscored the Celtics 12 - 3 . The Clippers were led by Montrezl Harrell 's 21 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block in 29 minutes off the bench . Irving finished with 14 points , two rebounds and two assists on 4 - of - 1 shooting in 14 minutes . Danilo Gallinari scored 19 points , and added nine rebounds and four assists in his effort off the bench . Gordon Hayward led all scorers with 19 points , to go along with five rebounds and three assists on 4 - of - 11 shooting . The backcourt duo of Marcus Morris and Ivica Zubac were the only other players to reach double - digit scoring , supplying 12 and 11 points respectively . The Clippers will look to bounce back when they host the Houston Rockets ( 27 - 27 ) on Wednesday .
The Boston Celtics ( 37 - 21 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 26 - 30 ) 118 - 110 on Monday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Boston . The Celtics got out to a quick start in this matchup , out - scoring the Pistons 28 - 29 in the first quarter alone . The Celtics were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 43 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Celtics also out - rebounded the Pistons 47 - 41 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Celtics were led by Blake Griffin , who went 10 - for - 19 from the field and 8 - for - 12 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 32 points , while also adding eight rebounds and five assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 53 points and 19 rebounds over his last two games . Gordon Hayward had a strong showing as well . He went 5 - for - 8 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while adding eight rebounds and eight assists as well . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so it was good to see him get things turned around . Reggie Jackson added 18 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and three assists over 31 minutes , while Wayne Ellington chipped in 13 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 3 - 10 3Pt ) and one assist over 33 minutes as well . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Pistons will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Los Angeles Clippers ( 18 - 13 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 15 - 25 ) 125 - 121 on Sunday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Los Angeles . The Clippers got out to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Mavericks 30 - 50 right away in the first quarter . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this game , going 57 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks went 29 percent from the floor and just 12 percent from beyond the arc . The Clippers also out - rebounded the Mavericks 40 - 45 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Clippers were led by Lou Williams on Sunday . He went 9 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 26 points , while also adding eight assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 69 points and 31 rebounds over his last two games . JJ Reddick was the only other starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 19 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and eight assists . Danilo Gallinari came off the bench for 12 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 8 FT ) and a game - high of nine rebounds in 25 minutes . The Clippers ' next game will be on the road against the Phoenix Suns on Wednesday , while the Mavericks will travel to Chicago to play the Bulls on Saturday .

The Clippers continued to pursue perfection on their home court and keep the NBA record for most wins in the regular season alive and well after holding off the Pacers . Their offense is firing on all cylinders , and coach David Blatt is using unconventional lineups to get the work done . He 's regularly used Joel Embiid in the starting lineup . Embiid put up 35 points on 8 - for - 15 from the field , including 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line . J.J. Redick played a team - high 31 minutes , and scored 25 points . The Sixers have won three of their last five games , as they continue to boast the worst record in the NBA . Hassan Whiteside returned from a one - game absence with a calf injury to put up a double - double of 35 points and 18 rebounds in 36 minutes . The 76ers will finish off their back - to - back set in Portland on Friday against the Trail Blazers . Gasol and Rose remain questionable for the game . The Heat will go on the road to Washington to take on the Wizards on Monday . Miami has lost four of their last five games as they have struggled to find a proper balance on both sides of the court all season . J.J. Redick led the way with 25 points and three assists in 31 minutes , while Hassan Whiteside recorded a double - double of 13 points and 11 rebounds in 22 minutes .
The Los Angeles Lakers ( 9 - 7 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 6 - 10 ) 113 - 97 on Tuesday . Los Angeles stopped their two - game losing streak with the win . LeBron James led the way with a career - high 51 points in 38 minutes . LeBron James recorded a triple - double of 51 points ( 19 - 31 FG , 6 - 8 3Pt , 7 - 10 FT ) with eight rebounds , three assists , and two steals in 38 minutes . LeBron James had 51 points , going 19 - for - 31 from the field , including 6 - for - 8 from beyond the three - point line . LeBron James scored 51 points on 19 - of - 31 shooting from the field . He also had eight rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block in 38 minutes . Tyson Whiteside had an uncharacteristic six points and seven rebounds in 27 minutes . Wayne Ellington scored 19 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting to go along with four rebounds and a pair of assists . Hassan Whiteside made his regular season debut with the Heat and finished with six points and seven rebounds in 27 minutes . The Lakers will go on the road to face the Denver Nuggets on Sunday . Miami has lost four of their last five games . Their schedule was weighted with tough games to start the season , but as they 've hit a lighter group of competition , the Lakers have excelled . LeBron James and Brandon Ingram both sat out due to unrelated injuries . Justise Winslow returned to the starting lineup , putting up six points and six rebounds in 25 minutes . Miami will go on the road to face the Denver Nuggets on Saturday .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 8 - 10 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 6 - 11 ) 104 - 92 on Monday at the Amway Center in Miami . The Nets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Heat 20 - 13 right away in the first quarter . They were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 26 percent from the three - point line , while the Heat went 36 percent from the floor and just 22 percent from beyond the arc . The Nets were also able to force the Heat into 18 turnovers , while only committing 11 of their own . The Nets were led by Hassan Whiteside , who went 9 - for - 21 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 21 points , while also recording 23 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 41 points and 35 rebounds over his last two games . Josh Richardson had a strong showing as well , finishing with 16 points ( 6 - 20 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 7 FT ) and four rebounds . It was his first double - double of the year , setting a season - high for rebounds . Spencer Dinwiddie chipped in with 16 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and two rebounds as well . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday , while the Heat will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Miami Heat , 115 - 113 , at Philips Arena on Wednesday . Wire-to-wire wins are rare in the NBA , but Atlanta was able to capture one here , despite the game being decided late in the fourth quarter . In fact , the Hawks ended the game on an 4 - 5 run to cap off the wire - to - wire victory . Atlanta 's offense was extremely efficient , as they shot 48 percent from the field and recorded 22 assists . Miami shot 48 percent from the field , while Atlanta shot just 46 percent in the defeat . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Atlanta winning that battle , 46 - 43 . The Hawks ( 7 - 13 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and they came out of the All-Star break with some fury . Josh Richardson continued his good form , as he led the team with 22 points , eight rebounds and four assists . Wayne Ellington was second on the team , dropping 15 points , five rebounds and three assists off the bench . Hassan Whiteside recorded another double - double , amassing 11 points and 10 rebounds . Wayne Ellington was huge off the bench , providing 15 points , five rebounds and three assists . On deck for the Hawks is a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets on Saturday . The Hawks ( 7 - 13 ) have struggled all season and a meltdown like this to the best team in the league only adds to the troubles . Hassan Whiteside did all he could to keep Miami hanging around , as he accumulated 11 points , 10 rebounds , two steals and two blocks in the defeat . Dwyane Wade was second on the team , as he scored 18 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting . Hassan Whiteside recorded another double - double , totaling 11 points and 10 rebounds . Wayne Ellington was huge off the bench , dropping 15 points and five rebounds .
The Miami Heat ( 8 - 13 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 11 - 12 ) 106 - 101 on Saturday . Miami has won two of their last three games as they continue to experiment with their latest starting lineup that includes Julius Randle at small forward in place of Jahlil Okafor ( knee ) . Okafor has missed the last two games with a partially torn quadriceps muscle . He suffered a back contusion Wednesday , thrusting him into the starting lineup at power forward for the Heat . Tim Frazier moved into the starting lineup in place of Jahlil Okafor ( knee ) , but he finished with six points and nine assists in 24 minutes . Jahlil Okafor started at point guard and put up eight points , 10 rebounds and one block in 26 minutes off the bench . The Pelicans will embark on a three - game road trip that begins against the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday . New Orleans has lost two of their last three games as they 've started to find a groove with interim starting point guard Anthony Davis . He scored 41 points to go along with nine rebounds , two assists , one steal and four blocks in 41 minutes . Randle has been doing a great job of attacking the basket and getting to the free throw line . Over his last two games he 's got to the charity stripe 19 times and sank 15 of those attempts . His partner in the frontcourt , Nikola Mirotic , posted a double - double of 15 points and four rebounds in 29 minutes .

Hassan Whiteside led the way with a double - double of 23 points and 20 rebounds in 34 minutes . The Heat have two days off before going on the road to the play the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday . The Heat 's next game is on the road Monday against the New Orleans Pelicans . The Jazz have three days off before they go on the road to face the San Antonio Spurs on Saturday . Utah has lost four straight games . They could n't buy a shot from downtown Wednesday as they shot 33 percent from beyond the arc . Jae Crowder scored a game - high 23 points in 34 minutes . The Heat will go on the road to face the Denver Nuggets on Saturday . Utah has lost two straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Jazz will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Jazz have the right guys to build a winning team around . Ricky Rubio led the team in scoring with 23 points on 9 - of - 13 shooting to go along with six assists and five rebounds in 36 minutes . Jae Crowder was close behind , scoring 19 points and grabbing six rebounds in 34 minutes . Up next , the Heat will stay at home Wednesday to take on the Bulls , while the Jazz will head home Friday and go up against the Rockets .

The Miami Heat ( 17 - 17 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 8 - 28 ) 118 - 94 on Friday . Miami is on a two - game win streak . They jumped out to a 29 - 30 lead after the first quarter and held the lead for the rest of the game . Miami shot 53 percent from the field while holding the Cavaliers to 38 percent shooting . The Cavaliers gave up 29 easy points on 14 turnovers , pointing to their greatest weakness Friday and the primary reason for their loss . Spencer Hawes missed his ninth straight game with a bone bruise in his knee , and while some reports suggest he 's close to returning , if George Hill 's bone bruise in his knee was any clue , Hawes could miss considerably more time . Hill , of the Indiana Pacers , missed nearly two months with the injury after initially being projected to only miss about three weeks . The Cavaliers have now won four of their last five games . Dwyane Wade scored a game - high 10 points in 24 minutes . Cleveland will go on the road to Washington to take on the Wizards on Monday . The Cavaliers will have a quick turnaround as they travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs in a rematch of last year 's Eastern Conference Finals , while the Cavs have a couple days off before hosting the Atlanta Hawks ( 28 - 23 ) on Saturday . Miami has managed to stay fixed in the playoff picture despite the onslaught of inuries . Heading into Friday 's matchup , the Cavaliers had lost three straight and seven of their last ten . However , the Cavs came out flat and were routed by one of the best teams in the Eastern Conference . They shot just 38 percent from the field and 35 percent from beyond the arc , but were able to out - rebound them 42 - 42 on the night .

The Heat also secured a hefty 45 - 28 rebounding advantage , helping push them to a victory . The Heat 's duo of Collin and Josh Richardson did the bulk of the damage in this one . Sexton went 11 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding six rebounds and six assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 26 rebounds over his last two games . Josh Richardson had a strong showing as well , posting 20 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , two rebounds and five assists in 35 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of two games , combining for 50 points and 12 rebounds over that span . Brandon Knight had a strong showing as well . He went 6 - for - 11 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 15 points , while adding six assists and a steal . He 's now averaging 15 points and 7 assists on the season . Hassan Whiteside was able to notch a double - double of his own . He finished with 11 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and 11 rebounds , marking his first double - double of the year . The only other Cavalier to reach double - digit points was Kelly Olynyk , who chipped in with 15 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) as well . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Cavaliers will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Miami Heat , 125 - 104 , at Air Canada Centre on Sunday . Toronto were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this dominating victory . Not only did Toronto win all four quarters , they never relinquished the lead after the first quarter . Toronto actually led for the majority of the game , as Miami never led by more than two points and never relinquished the lead from there . Shooting was the difference in the game , with Toronto shooting 57 percent and Miami hitting just 46 percent of their shots . The Raptors also took care of the interior , outscoring the Heat , 58 - 42 , in the paint . The Raptors ( 48 - 35 ) had to play this game without Devin Booker and Marc Gasol , but they did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to hold off the Raptors . Kyle Lowry carried the load , as he tallied 24 points , seven rebounds and 10 assists . Pascal Siakam was second on the team , totaling 19 points and six rebounds on 8 - of - 12 shooting . The backcourt really struggled , as Goran Dragic and Dwyane Wade combined to go 19 - of - 36 from the field . Dwyane Wade went just 7 - of - 12 from the field , but finished with 15 points , two rebounds and four assists . Kyle Lowry led the way for Toronto , as he accumulated 24 points , seven rebounds and 10 assists . Norman Powell started for DeRozan and finished with 15 points , three rebounds and three assists . Serge Ibaka recorded 10 points and eight rebounds .

They really took control in the first half , as the Bucks led 77 - 36 after one quarter . The Bucks shot 48 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range in the win . They also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 52 boards to the Heat 45 . Miami had to play this game without Pau Gasol and Pau Gasol , but they simply didn ’ t have enough offense to get back . Khris Middleton stepped up in his absence , as he tallied 21 points and eight assists . Justise Winslow was the only other player in double figures , as he totaled 20 points , two rebounds and five assists . More importantly , the notoriously bad shooter went 8 - for - 12 from the field and committed just two turnovers in the loss . Goran Dragic continued his good form though , as he led the team with 20 points . Hassan Whiteside was a beast down low , as he totaled 14 points , 11 rebounds and three blocks in the win . All five starters scored in double - figures , with Khris Middleton and Justise Winslow combining for 21 points and 5 assists . The Bucks will look to play better on Saturday in a road matchup against the Milwaukee Bucks .

He was able to get to the free throw line at will , and converted on 2 - of - 2 attempts . He 's now scored in double figures in all four games for the Hornets this season . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 43 points and 23 rebounds over his last two games . Walker came just shy of a double - double , as he posted 23 points ( 9 - 21 FG , 3 - 10 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and five assists . The three steals matched a season - high for him . It was a season - high in points for Hield , who had n't reached the 20 - point mark yet this season . Marvin Bagley also did everything he could to keep the Kings close . The Hornets ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Kings will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

Rudy Gobert led the way for the Spurs in the losing effort , recording 18 points on 5 - of - 7 shooting , 10 rebounds and four assists in 29 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge was the only other Spurs starter to score in double figures , finishing with 14 points on 5 - of - 7 shooting and five rebounds . Ricky Rubio recorded a double - double , putting up 12 points on 5 - of - 10 shooting and seven assists in 29 minutes , while Ricky Rubio recorded a double - double of 12 points and seven assists . Ricky Rubio fell just short of a triple - double , recording 12 points , seven assists , five rebounds , three steals and seven blocks in 24 minutes , while the Jazz shot a woeful 49 percent from the field and 61 percent from behind the arc . Up next , the Jazz will head home Wednesday to take on the Wizards , while the Spurs will stay home to take on the Nets on Wednesday . San Antonio , on the other hand , will return to action Monday at home against the Raptors .

The Thunder got off to a quick start , out - scoring the Knicks 34 - 16 in the first quarter alone . The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 52 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 45 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder also secured a 49 - 36 rebounding advantage , helping push them to a victory . The Thunder 's duo of Paul George and Russell Westbrook did most of the damage to the Thunder . George went 9 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding four rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 11 rebounds over his last two games . Hardaway , on the other hand , finished with 23 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) of his own , to go along with three assists in 27 minutes . He had a very poor shooting performance ( 3 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt ) in Sunday 's game against the Milwaukee Bucks , so it was good to see him get things turned back around and have a decent performance . Russell Westbrook also did his part in the victory , as he went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding nine assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 31 points and 35 rebounds over his last two games . The Thunder 's next game will be on the road against the Indiana Pacers on Tuesday , while the Knicks will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Tuesday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the New York Knicks , 114 - 110 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday afternoon . The Knicks ( 10 - 20 ) checked in to Saturday as one of the top road teams in the league , and the Rockets ( 27 - 36 ) particularly looked in question . However , the Rockets ( 27 - 20 ) were looking to reestablish their confidence after falling flat in their first game without Kevin Durant ( knee ) on Friday . The prolific Splash Bros made sure of that , putting together a performance that hearkened back to last season by combining for 60 points , including nine three - pointers . No other player on the team scored more than 14 but it proved to be enough to hold off a feisty Knicks ( 25 - 45 ) squad that kept matters close until the closing minute . Houston was once again led by James , who posted a game - high 61 points , along with 15 rebounds , four assists and five steals . Gordon was right behind him with 20 points , four rebounds and a pair of steals . Kenneth Faried posted an 11 - point , 8 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , three steals and three blocks . Mudiay and Emmanuel Mudiay turned in a pair of 14 - point efforts , with the former also supplying two rebounds , two assists and a steal , and the latter tallying eight boards , an assist and two blocks . Mitchell players made three field - digit scoring scorers on the night , led all scorers with 12 points , a total he supplemented with a rebound , a steal and three blocks . The Knicks remain in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head home to face the Orlando Magic on Monday . James Harden led the way for Houston with a 61 - point , four - rebound , four - assist effort that also included five steals and a block . Tim Hardaway , Jr. was next in line , tallying 21 points , four rebounds and an assist . Emmanuel Mudiay ( 14 points , four rebounds , two assists and a steal ) and Kenneth Faried ( 11 points , eight rebounds , an assist , three steals and a block ) filled the stat sheet as well . Noah registered a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double , while Noah Vonleh compiled 10 points , 10 boards , two assists , a steal and a block . Houston remains in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division with the worst record in the league . They 're home again on Wednesday to face off with the Miami Heat .
The Miami Heat ( 24 - 24 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 10 - 38 ) 106 - 97 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in New York . The Heat got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 25 - 26 in the first quarter alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field , while the Knicks went just 43 percent from the floor . The Knicks also out - rebounded the Knicks 47 - 38 , even furthering their advantage in this one . The Heat were led by the duo of Tim Hardaway , Jr. and Wayne Ellington . Hardaway Jr had a very strong game off the bench , going 7 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 22 points , while adding five assists as well . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 42 points and 23 rebounds over his last two games . Ellington on the other hand finished with 19 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 4 - 11 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) of his own , to go along with five rebounds and two steals . He 's picked it up offensively of late , averaging 25 points over his last five games . Hassan Whiteside also did his best to keep the Knicks in this game . He went 6 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the free throw line to score 13 points , while adding 17 rebounds and three blocked shots as well . The double - double was his first since the end of January , as he was a huge reason the Heat were able to pull out a win . For the Knicks , Hassan Whiteside continued to impress . He went 6 - for - 10 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 13 points , while also adding 17 rebounds and three blocked shots . The double - double was his second in a row , as he 's combined for 38 points and 24 rebounds over his last two games . The only other Knick to reach double figures in points was Trey Burke , who scored 16 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) in 23 minutes off the bench . The Knicks ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday , while the Knicks will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Boston Celtics ( 33 - 19 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 10 - 41 ) 113 - 99 on Monday at the Barclays Center in New York . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 25 - 20 in the first quarter alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field , while the Knicks went just 45 percent from the floor . The Celtics also out - rebounded the Knicks 43 - 48 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Celtics were led by the duo of Kyrie Irving and Kevin Knox . Irving went 9 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also adding six assists and two steals . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 45 points and 26 rebounds over his last two games . Irving , on the other hand , finished with 23 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , six assists and two steals over 36 minutes . He 's been absolutely phenomenal throughout the whole second half of this season and he continues to put all the pressure on his own shoulders here in the final stretch , as he 's averaging a ridiculous 21 points and 12 rebounds over his last three games . The third member of the starting five to reach double figures in points was Gordon Hayward , who finished with 14 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) . He had only reached double figures in points twice this year , so it was a nice surprise for the Knicks . Al Horford added 14 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) and nine rebounds in 27 minutes as well . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Knicks will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .

The New York Knicks ( 12 - 48 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 33 - 28 ) 130 - 118 on Friday . New York came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldn ’ t hold off a bad Knicks team . The key for New York was their shooting , as they shot 51 percent from the field , 74 percent from the free - throw line and 43 percent from three - point range . They also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 49 rebounds to the Spurs 50 . This marks the third - straight loss for the Spurs and skeptics wonder if this is regression finally hitting this surprise team . DeMar DeRozan had another great game , as he tallied 32 points , nine rebounds and four assists in the loss . Dennis Schroeder was the only other player who scored more than 15 points , as he tallied 19 points , six rebounds and four assists . Up next for the Knicks is a matchup with the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday . This was a game that the Knicks were supposed to win and they did a great job of leaving nothing to chance . Dennis Schroeder was the player of the game , as he scored a team - high 19 points while also dishing out 13 assists . Kevin Knox was the only other starter in double figures , as he tallied 18 points and three rebounds . It doesn ’ t get much easier in San Antonio 's next game either , as they travel to play the Cleveland Cavaliers on Sunday .

Both teams came into this game in the midst of four - game winning streaks and both teams came in on the back end of a back - to - back set . It was clear there were some tired legs out there , as the shooting was off with a much lower score than anticipated . Both squads combined to shoot well under 42 percent from the field with the two teams combining to go 17 - for - 57 from three - point range . What killed the Lakers was the rebounding , as they brought down 45 boards to the Lakers 35 . The Lakers played this game without Andre Ingram and Andre Ingram , as they simply did n't have enough in the tank to win this game . LeBron James did all he could though , as he tallied 33 points , six rebounds and eight assists in the loss . Mario Hezonja also had a nice game off the bench , as he contributed 17 points , eight rebounds , two assists and two steals in the victory . This is a very talented team and they are still feared no matter how bad their record looks . The Knicks have now won four of their last five games and the next game is the long - best rebounding team . The Knicks will look to keep this going against the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday , who are one of the worst defenses in the NBA . Andre Jordan was the star of the show , as he tallied 33 points and six rebounds in the win . Mario Hezonja also had a nice game off the bench , as he amassed 17 points , eight rebounds , two steals and two blocks . On deck for the Knicks is a matchup with the Cleveland Cavaliers on Wednesday .

The New York Knicks defeated the Washington Wizards , 113 - 110 , at Madison Square Garden on Tuesday . The Knicks ( 32 - 64 ) have been flirting with losing their hold on the Eastern Conference 's top seed and entered Friday 's contest just one game ahead of the Boston Celtics . Jabari Parker had a pair of 16 - point efforts to lead all scorers , and the Knicks also shot 51 percent from the field overall , clearing a path to victory . New York was led by Thomas ' 30 points , which he supplemented with five assists , six rebounds and two steals . Luke Kornet was right behind Hezonja with a 17 - point , seven - rebound double - double that also included an assist , four blocks and a steal . Bradley Beal was right behind him with 13 points , five assists , three rebounds and a steal . Bobby Portis actually served as the second - leading scorer on the team despite coming off the bench , posting 11 points , 10 rebounds and a block over 38 minutes . The Dallas Mavericks ( 2 - 1 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 0 - 3 ) 115 - 109 on Tuesday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas . The Mavericks were able to use a strong second half , where they out - scored the Bulls 56 - 41 to coast to a 8 - point victory at home in front of their home crowd . The Mavericks were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Bulls went 51 percent from the floor and a meager 57 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Mavericks forced the Bulls into 19 turnovers , while committing just 15 of their own . Continuing his dominance of late , Zach LaVine did most of the damage for the Bulls . He went 11 - for - 15 from the field and 7 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 34 points , while adding three rebounds and two assists as well . It was his second impressive performance in a row , as he 's combined for 41 points and 18 rebounds over his last two games . The only other Hornet to reach double figures was Dorian Finney-Smith , who chipped in with 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and five rebounds in 31 minutes . The Bulls ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Bulls will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday .
