New York has won seven straight games , and in their last two games , they 've done it without starting center Andrew Bogut who has been sidelined with tendinitis in his knee . David Lee ( hamstring ) is nearing a return but has yet to be cleared to return to action , and even when Lee does return , there does n't seem to be more than a marginal role off off the bench available to him . Dennis Smith led the way for the Knicks , recording a team - high 23 points in 32 minutes off the bench . The Knicks will go on the road to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . Dallas has lost two straight and five of their last six games . Injuries can be blamed for most of their woes . Dwyane Wade missed four of those games with a hamstring issue , including being out Thursday . JJ Reddick returned to action Friday after missing the previous nine games with a torn plantar fascia in his foot . Tim Hardaway has stepped into the starting lineup in their absence , and he finished with double - digit points for the fourth straight game Wednesday . Smith finished with 19 points and seven rebounds in 27 minutes . The Mavericks will go on the road to face the Denver Nuggets on Sunday . Dallas has dropped two straight games and will look to turn things around in their next matchup against the San Antonio Spurs on Saturday .

The Dallas Mavericks ( 26 - 29 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 33 - 22 ) 102 - 101 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers came out firing in this one , out - scoring the Trail Blazers 25 - 24 in the first quarter alone . The Mavericks were the superior shooters in this game , going 41 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Trail Blazers went 49 percent from the floor and just 31 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks were also able to force the Trail Blazers into 19 turnovers , while only committing 15 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Mavericks were led by the duo of Damian Lillard and Tim Hardaway Jr . Lillard shot 10 - for - 23 from the field and 6 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding five assists . It was a new season - high in points for him and a nice bounce back game for him . Nurkic , on the other hand , went 9 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while adding 10 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 43 points and 35 rebounds over his last two games . Notching a double - double of his own , Jusuf Nurkic added 18 points ( 9 - 11 FG ) and 10 rebounds , marking his first double - double of the year . C.J . McCollum was also very effective in the losing effort , scoring 14 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , while adding six rebounds and five assists . The four steals matched a season - high for him , while the double - double was his second in a row . Notching a double - double of his own was Dwight Powell , who came off the bench for 13 points ( 3 - 6 FG , 7 - 8 FT ) and eight rebounds in 18 minutes . It marked his second double - double in a row , combining for 35 points and 35 rebounds over those two games . Dorian Finney-Smith chipped in with 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt ) and six rebounds , while Rodney Hood chipped in 11 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt ) and six rebounds . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Lakers on Wednesday , while the Trail Blazers will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday .
The Miami Heat ( 26 - 30 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 26 - 31 ) 112 - 101 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Miami . The Heat got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Mavericks 29 - 25 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks went 39 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat also secured a 47 - 38 rebounding advantage , helping push them to a convincing 24 - point victory . The Heat 's backcourt of Dwyane Wade and Dion Waiters did most of the damage for the Heat . Wade went 9 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding three assists and two blocked shots . It was a season - high in points for Waiters , who had n't reached the 38 - point mark yet this season , so he 'll look to continue with his momentum moving forward . Tim Hardaway Jr. also had a solid showing off the bench . He went 7 - for - 15 from the field and 4 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding two rebounds in 30 minutes . It marked his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 54 points and 18 rebounds over his last two games . Dion Waiters was the other Nugget in double figures , as he finished with 14 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and six assists . For the Mavericks , Dwyane Wade did most of the damage offensively . He went 9 - for - 13 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding four rebounds and three blocked shots . He 's now pushed his season averages to 17 points and 1 rebounds on the year . Dion Waiters was the only other starter in double figures , as he finished with 20 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , three assists and a steal . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 22 points and 14 assists over his last two games . The Heat 's next game will be on the road against the Boston Celtics on Wednesday , while the Mavericks will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Denver Nuggets ( 40 - 18 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 26 - 32 ) 114 - 104 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets were the superior shooters in this game , going 41 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks went 40 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets also out - rebounded the Mavericks 63 - 42 , only furthering their advantage in this one . Like he 's done so many times already this season , Nikola Powell led the Nuggets in this one . He went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding six rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 67 points and 23 rebounds over his last two games . Isaiah Thomas came one assist shy of a double - double , as he posted 13 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and a pair of assists in 29 minutes . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of January , so it was good to see him get things turned around . Isaiah Thomas added 16 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and two assists off the bench . The Mavericks were led by Jalen Nikola Jokic and Paul Millsap . Jokic had 19 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and 13 rebounds , while Millsap posted 17 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and 13 rebounds . Jokic has been unguardable in his last three games , averaging 25 points and six rebounds over that span . Leading the starters in scoring , Paul Millsap posted 17 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , 13 rebounds and three steals . It was his second straight night with 13 points , as he 's been a big reason the Nuggets were able to sneak out the win . Coming off the bench , Mason Plumlee had a solid showing as well . He went 5 - for - 9 from the field and 2 - for - 7 from the free throw line to score 12 points , while adding 13 rebounds and two blocked shots as well . The Mavericks ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Mavericks will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Mavericks got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pacers 28 - 27 right away in the first quarter . The Mavericks also forced the Pacers into 14 turnovers , while committing just 15 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Mavericks were led by the duo of Jalen Jalen and Bojan Bogdanovic , who went off for a game - high of 22 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , while also adding four rebounds in 36 minutes . It was a season - high in points for Bogdanovic and a nice surprise for the Mavericks , as he 's averaging only 16 points per game so far this season . He shot a combined 7 - for - 10 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . Coming off the bench , Dwight Powell had a solid showing . He recorded 12 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 1 - 3 FT ) and seven rebounds , while Darren Collison chipped in with 20 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 4 - 10 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and one assist . It was n't a nice surprise for the Pacers , as he 's averaging only 14 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a double - double , Thaddeus Young finished with 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , five rebounds and four blocked shots . The Pacers ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Pacers will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday .

It was his second straight game with 15 points , as he 's gone a combined 10 - for - 28 from the field and 12 - for - 19 from the three - point line over those two outings . He 's now averaging 10 points and 4 rebounds on the season . Dwight Powell had a solid contribution off the bench , as he went 4 - for - 7 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 13 points , while adding eight rebounds as well . The only other Mavericks player to reach double figures in points was Tim Hardaway Jr. , who came off the bench for 15 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and three rebounds . The Grizzlies ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Mavericks will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Dallas Mavericks 94 - 93 Wednesday at American Airlines Center . The Rockets ( 41 - 39 ) came into Wednesday 's contest with a plethora of injuries , missing the likes of Rudy Gay ( Achilles ) , Omri Casspi ( foot ) and Garrett Temple ( hamstring ) . However , a bit of a complementary role on the offensive side was the play of point guard Eric Gordon , who led the team with 26 points on 10 - of - 20 shooting from the field while hitting 1 - of - 13 from three - point range . It was the first time since late - November that the 39 - year - old Argentinian played 22 minutes in a single game and just the third time all season . More importantly , though , is the idea that when Gordon Gordon has his breakout season of the new year , he has been on a tear over the stretch of March . After his 26 - point performance Wednesday against the Mavericks , Gordon is averaging 33 points over his last three games and has shot over 57 percent in each of those contests . On the other side , it was Eric Gordon who shined in an efficient outing , shooting 10 - of - 20 from the field en route to 26 points in 32 minutes as a reserve . As a team , it was a very strong shooting night for Houston , as they shot just 41 percent from the field overall and 31 percent from behind the arc . For the Rockets , it was a night to forget , as the team shot just 41 percent from the field and 28 percent from behind the arc . Only one Dallas starter scored in double figures , and the team managed to shoot just 42 percent from the field . They simply could n't get anything going , shooting just 41 percent from the field and 31 percent from behind the arc . Dirk Nowitzki led the way with just six points and one assist , but he shot just 1 - of - 3 from the field and 3 - of - 4 from behind the arc . Up next , the Rockets will look to keep rolling at home Wednesday against the Pistons , while the Mavericks will head to Memphis on Friday to play the Grizzlies .

The Dallas Mavericks ( 28 - 41 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 17 - 53 ) 121 - 116 on Wednesday . In a game between two of the fastest - paced teams in the NBA , the offenses were downright ugly tonight . Dallas shot 52 percent from the field and 81 percent from the free - throw line in their win . They also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 40 boards to the Cavs 33 . Cleveland came into this game as a double - digit favorite and did n't disappoint . No player had a huge game , but no one played more than 29 minutes either . Tim Hardaway Jr. led the team with 22 points and also dished out four assists in the absence of Courtney Lee . The bench was solid as well , as Jordan Kleber , Dorian Finney-Smith and Trey Burke all scored in double figures . More importantly , Dorian Finney-Smith tallied 14 points , six assists and six rebounds in the win , while tallying 14 points , six rebounds and six assists . On deck for Dallas is a matchup with the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday . This was a game that the Mavericks were supposed to win and they did a great job of leaving nothing to chance . Kevin Love was the player of the game , as he tallied 22 points and 12 rebounds in the win . Tim Hardaway Jr. got a rare start and totaled 22 points , four rebounds and two assists . Dorian Finney-Smith led the team with 14 points and six assists , while Dorian Finney-Smith provided 14 points and six rebounds . The Mavericks will look to keep rolling on Tuesday against the Brooklyn Nets .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 28 - 42 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 31 - 42 ) 125 - 129 on Friday . Both teams entered the game with their rosters at less than full strength , and the result was a gritty , grind - it - out affair . The visitors were missing stalwart power forward Kenneth Faried , who was out due to the birth of his child , while the Pelicans had their starting backcourt sidelined . Courtney Lee was forced to miss the contest with a hip injury , but he did not return . Tim Hardaway , Jr. led the way for Dallas , as he posted 21 points , six rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block . Tim Hardaway , Jr. followed with a bench - leading 21 points , which he supplemented six rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Elfrid Payton followed with 19 points , 11 assists , 10 rebounds and a steal . Rookie Jalen was the only other member of the starting five to hit double digits in the scoring column , as he pitched in with 14 points , three rebounds , four assists , a steal and a block . Ian Clark and Ian Clark rounded out the starting five with a pair of 10 - point efforts , with the former adding a rebound and a steal and the latter supplying eight boards , three assists , three blocks and a steal . The Pelicans remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They head to Philadelphia to take on the Sixers on Sunday . Dallas 's attack was spearheaded by Julius Randle , who posted a 30 - point , 9 - rebound double - double that also included four assists , a steal and a block . Frank Hardaway III was next in line with a 21 - point , six - rebound effort that also included a pair of assists , a steal and a block . Elfrid Payton was next with 19 points , 11 assists and a pair of rebounds . Powell followed with 21 points , six rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block . Dwight Powell led the reserves with 10 points , one rebound and two assists . The Pelicans remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They head to Philadelphia to take on the Sixers on Sunday .

He leads all rookies with 8 assists per game and is second to the 76ers ’ Nerlens Noel with 0 steals per game . Brooklyn has lost three of their last four games as they struggle to try and fill the hole of Jabari Parker ( knee ) being out for the rest of the season . Caris LeVert led the way in scoring with 29 points , while Clint Capela put up a double - double of his own with 22 points and 13 rebounds . Mike Dunleavy ( ankle ) missed a fourth straight game and will undergo an MRI on Saturday . He has not been able to run , yet , making him questionable in the short term . The Nets will go on the road to face the Hawks on Sunday , and the Nets will return home to host the Miami Heat on Saturday . Brooklyn has dropped two straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Nets will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Rockets have the right guys to build a winning team around . The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 8 - 11 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 8 - 12 ) 112 - 102 on Saturday . Minnesota has won four straight games , and while the wins have come during an easy part of their schedule ( Sixers , Jazz , Nuggets , Timberwolves ) , the talking heads have tried to fit the narrative of Lance Stephenson ( groin ) sitting out as the reason for the Timberwolves ' success . Stephenson has missed the last four games , coinciding with the Timberwolves ' resurgence , and while they have no doubt played remarkably better of late , putting all the blame on one player is misleading . Derrick Rose led the way for the team with a game - high 25 points and shot 11 - of - 17 from the field and 2 - of - 2 from behind the arc . Derrick Rose , who 's been hobbled by a hamstring injury , started and played 35 minutes , scoring 25 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) to go with six rebounds and three assists . The Nets will have a few days off before taking on the New York Knicks at home on Saturday night .

The Utah Jazz ( 10 - 12 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 8 - 14 ) 101 - 91 on Saturday . Utah has won four of their last six games as they continue to find ways to win without DeMar DeRozan ( adductor ) in the lineup . Allen Crabbe has been filling in as the starting small forward while Batum has been out the last three games , and coach Terry Stotts threw a minor curve ball Saturday by inserting Spencer Crabbe into the starting lineup in place of Aldridge . Crabbe played 26 minutes as the starting power forward and scored nine points with three rebounds in 26 minutes . Shabazz Napier scored a team - high 18 points in 22 minutes off the bench , shooting 5 - for - 11 from the field and 1 - for - 6 from three - point range . The Nets have two days off before going on the road to the play the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday . The Jazz 's next game will be at home against the Idiana Pacers on Saturday as well . The Jazz will continue their road trip in Los Angeles on Saturday against the Clippers . Brooklyn has lost four straight , and the injury bug continues to infect them . Ricky Rubio ( ankle ) , Kevin Martin ( wrist ) and Kenneth Faried ( Achilles ) were both out of the lineup for the Nets . Rudy Gobert had a big game with 23 points and 16 rebounds in 33 minutes . The Nets will return home to host the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 13 - 8 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 8 - 7 ) 131 - 125 on Monday . Memphis has won eight straight games and are defining themselves as a contender to win the Eastern Conference this season . Mike Conley paced the Grizzlies with a game - high 37 points on 13 - of - 25 shooting in 46 minutes . Marc Gasol lead the way with a double - double of 15 points and 15 rebounds , while both DeMarre Carroll and Marc Gasol finished in double figures for the second straight game . Jackson put up 26 points and eight assists in 45 minutes , while Napier put up 18 points and two assists in 24 minutes off the bench . They 'll return home to host the Houston Rockets on Sunday . The Nets will go on the road to Toronto to take on the Raptors on Monday . The loss drops Brooklyn to just a half - game behind the Hornets for the eighth and final playoff spot in the East . Up next , the Grizzlies will stay home Wednesday and go up against the Trail Blazers , while Brooklyn will stay home and go up against the Clippers on Wednesday . The Nets have two days off before going on the road to the play the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday , while the Nets will travel to Philadelphia to take on the 76ers , while the Nets will head home to take on the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday before turning it a hit for a four - game road trip in Portland on Saturday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 5 - 18 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 8 - 17 ) 99 - 97 on Saturday . Cleveland has won four straight games , and while the wins have come during an easy part of their schedule ( Sixers , Jazz , Nuggets , Nets ) , the talking heads have tried to fit the narrative of Lance Stephenson ( groin ) sitting out as the reason for the Cavaliers ' success . Stephenson has missed the last four games , coinciding with the Cavaliers ' resurgence , and while they have no doubt played remarkably better of late , putting all the blame on one player is misleading . D'Angelo Russell led the way for the Cavs with a game - high 30 points on 13 - of - 31 shooting in 33 minutes . Tristan Thompson was the only other starter to score in double figures , putting up 19 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting and 14 rebounds . Alec Burks ( 13 ) and Rodions ( 12 ) round out the Nets players in double figures , while Shabazz Napier scored 10 points in 18 minutes off the bench . The Cavaliers have now won four straight games , including three straight at home . The Cavaliers will play the second half of a back - to - back set Saturday when they host the Nets . Cleveland has been devastated by injuries lately , but it pulled together a complete effort to win its second game in a row . D'Angelo Russell had a nice game , shooting 13 - of - 31 from the field en route to scoring a team - high 30 points and dishing out six assists .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 9 - 18 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 21 - 18 ) 106 - 105 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Toronto . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors went 39 percent from the floor and just 31 percent from beyond the arc . The Raptors also out - rebounded the Raptors 60 - 41 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Nets were led by Jonas Valanciunas , who went 10 - for - 15 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 24 points , while also adding eight rebounds and a blocked shot in 26 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 59 points and 14 rebounds over his last two games . He 's also pushed his season averages to 20 points , 3 rebounds and 6 assists per game . Kyle Lowry also played a big factor in the win . He went 13 - for - 22 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 29 points , while also adding five rebounds . He 's now averaging 15 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Spencer Dinwiddie had a strong showing , going 7 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 17 points in 31 minutes . It was a nice surprise for the Raptors , as he 's averaging only 12 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a double - double , Jarrett Allen finished with 12 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 10 rebounds . It was his second double - double in his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaged 20 points and 8 rebounds . The only other Hornet to reach double figures was Rondae Hollis-Jefferson , who came off the bench for 11 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) and four rebounds . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday , while the Raptors will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 12 - 18 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 11 - 18 ) 125 - 118 on Monday at the Air Canada Centre in Brooklyn . The Nets were the superior shooting team in this one , going 52 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards went just 54 percent from the floor and 38 percent from beyond the arc . The Nets also out - rebounded the Wizards 45 - 26 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Nets were led by Spencer Dinwiddie in this one , as he finished with a team - high of 27 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 9 - 11 FT ) , to go along with four rebounds before fouling out . He had a very poor showing in Friday 's game against the Pacers , shooting just 17 percent ( 3 - 8 FG ) from the field , so it was good to see him get back on track Sunday . John Wall also played well , scoring 17 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and handing out 13 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 39 points and 9 assists over his last two games . The Nets also saw some solid contributions from their bench . Austin Rivers had 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 3 FT ) and three assists , while Kelly Oubre Jr added 10 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt ) and six rebounds off the bench . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday , while the Wizards will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

LeBron James was the hero , as he hit a game - winning three at the buzzer in overtime to win the game . The key in this game was the turnover differential , as the Nets committed 14 turnovers to the Nets 14 . The Lakers had to play this game without Nikola Vucevic and Kenneth Faried and it clearly hampered them here . LeBron James was the star of the show , as he tallied 36 points , 13 rebounds and eight assists in the loss . Kyle Russell led the team with 22 points and also dished out 13 assists in yet another great performance . D'Angelo Russell also had one of his best games of the season , as he tallied 22 points , four assists and four rebounds in the defeat . The Lakers will look to build off this win when they take on the Portland Trail Blazers on Thursday in the second half of a back - to - back set . The Lakers played this game without Kobe Bryant and they fared pretty well . LeBron James did his best to carry the team , as he accumulated 36 points , eight rebounds and eight assists in the loss . Joe Harris also had a nice game off the bench , as he amassed 19 points , four rebounds and two assists . Up next for the Nets is a matchup with the Utah Jazz on Sunday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 21 - 12 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 15 - 19 ) 114 - 106 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Pacers shot much better than the Nets in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Nets went 46 percent from the floor and just 52 percent from beyond the arc . The Pacers also forced the Nets into 20 turnovers , while only committing 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Pacers received most of their production from Thaddeus Young and Victor Oladipo . Oladipo went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 5 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding nine rebounds and six assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 57 points and 20 rebounds over his last two games . Bogdanovic , on the other hand , went 6 - for - 8 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from beyond the arc to score 17 points . It was a season - high in points for him , as he 's only reached double figures in points four other times this season . Myles Turner also had a solid showing , posting 15 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt ) , 12 rebounds and five blocked shots . He 's now pushed his season averages to 11 points and 3 rebounds on the year . Both Rondae Hollis-Jefferson and Joe Harris reached double figures as well with 10 and 10 points respectively . The Nets ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Nets will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday .

There wasn ’ t a whole lot to decipher these two teams on the stat sheet , as nearly every statistic was tight . Both teams hovered around 100 percent shooting in the first half and the two teams combined for just 41 points . The Hornets were unconscious from the field , as they shot 44 percent from the field , 48 percent from three - point range and 77 percent from the free - throw line . The Hornets also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 53 boards to the Nets 57 . Brooklyn has been struggling mightily recently , but this was a great performance against a hungry Hornets team . Kemba Walker was especially good , as he tallied 35 points , six rebounds and five assists in the win . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson also played well off the bench , as he double - doubled in a 16 - point , 15 - rebound performance . On deck for the Hornets is a matchup against the Boston Celtics on Monday . The Hornets have been playing some great ball as of late and they appear unbeatable at home . They are now 13 - 6 at the Chesapeake Arena and scoring at will . Both Kemba Walker and Kemba Walker put in some great performances here , as they combined for 37 points , nine rebounds and nine assists in the win . Spencer Dinwiddie continued his good form though , as he scored a career - high 37 points off the bench . Brooklyn will be off until Wednesday , when they host the Indiana Pacers in their next game .

The Brooklyn Nets ( 22 - 23 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 25 - 18 ) 109 - 102 on Friday . The form of these two teams would have indicated a different result , but the Nets put in a great effort to pick up a needed road win . Defense was key , as the Celtics held the Celtics to 41 percent shooting and a dreadful 5 - for - 18 from three - point range . The key for Brooklyn was the rebounding , as they brought down 55 boards to the Celtics 41 . Boston came into this game as huge underdogs and they played much better than the final score would indicate . The 20 - point loss was due to some poor late execution and ugly turnovers down the stretch . The shooting was just atrocious as they shot 25 - for - 84 from the field . They also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 55 boards to the Celtics 41 . Boston had to play this game without Kenneth Faried , who sat out with a shoulder injury . Jaylen Brown led the team in scoring , as he tallied 22 points and six rebounds on 9 - of - 18 shooting off the bench . Jarrett Allen also played well off the bench , as he amassed 19 points , six rebounds and four steals . Brad Hayward made his return to the court for a late game , as he accumulated a team - high 34 points , five rebounds , seven assists and three steals in the win . The bench also played well , as DeMarre Carroll , Joe Harris and Ed Davis all scored at least 10 points . The Celtics will look to keep things rolling on Wednesday against the Toronto Raptors .

The Kings were led by D'Angelo Russell , who tallied a game - high 31 points , a total he supplemented with four assists , four rebounds , a steal and a block . Six other players , three starters and three reserves , also posted double - digit scoring , leading the way to success rates of 50 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range . Joe Harris went for 19 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Joe Harris led the second unit with 14 points , five rebounds , two steals and a block . Willie Cauley-Stein totaled 12 points , six rebounds and two assists in a reserve role as well . D'Angelo Russell led the way for Brooklyn with a game - high 31 points , which he supplemented with four assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block . Joe Harris followed with a bench - leading 19 points , which he supplemented with seven boards , two assists and two steals . Spencer Dinwiddie led the bench with 11 points , three rebounds and six assists . Shabazz Napier led the second unit with 10 points , seven rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Joe Harris was next with a bench - leading 19 points , along with seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Willie Cauley-Stein totaled 12 points , six rebounds and two assists . Buddy Hield led the bench with 10 points , one rebound , two assists and three steals .

It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 45 points and 25 rebounds over his last two games . Russell went 10 - for - 22 from the field and 2 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 30 points , while also adding seven assists . He 's combined for 49 points and 17 rebounds over his last two games , so he 'll look to keep his confidence high going into the playoffs . He 's had a nice stretch of two games , combining for 55 points and 11 rebounds over that span . He had gone a combined 4 - for - 17 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . Coming off the bench , Rondae Hollis-Jefferson recorded a double - double , finishing with 18 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 3 - 6 FT ) , four rebounds and two blocked shots . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday , while the Bulls will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 28 - 32 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 46 percent from the field , while the Knicks went just 45 percent . The Nuggets also out - rebounded the Knicks 53 - 43 , only furthering their advantage in this one . Like he 's done so many times already this season , Malik Beasley led the team in scoring . He went 8 - for - 15 from the field and 5 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , while also adding six rebounds and five assists . It was a season - high in points for Beasley , who had n't reached the 20 - point mark yet this season . Kevin Knox also had a strong showing , posting 18 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and four rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , combining for 35 points and 32 rebounds over those two games . Emmanuel Mudiay had a solid showing , posting 15 points ( 7 - 20 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , nine assists , three steals and two blocked shots . He 's now pushed his season averages to 8 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The Nuggets also got a huge boost off the bench from rookie Malik Beasley . He went 8 - for - 15 from the field and 5 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , while also adding six rebounds and a steal . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 45 points and 24 rebounds over his last two games . The Nuggets also saw some solid contributions from their bench . Enes Kanter recorded 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) and 12 rebounds , while Enes Kanter added 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and 12 rebounds . The Knicks were led by Nikola Jokic , who recorded a double - double with 19 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and 14 rebounds over 34 minutes . It marked his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 39 points and 24 rebounds over his last two games . The only other Knick to reach double figures in points was Tim Hardaway Jr. , who recorded 16 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and two rebounds . Considering he 's averaging 10 points on the season , it was a nice surprise for the Knicks . The Denver Nuggets ( 26 - 11 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 18 - 20 ) 123 - 110 at FedEx Forum on Saturday . Denver came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but walked away with a huge win in front of their home crowd . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Nuggets recording 30 assists to seven turnovers , while the Hornets committed 17 turnovers to just 22 assists . The Nuggets shot 46 percent from the field , while holding the Hornets to 48 percent shooting . Denver also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 46 boards to the Hornets 47 . The Nuggets also shot 46 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range in the win . The Nuggets have been playing some great ball recently , but this was a baffling loss . Paul Millsap flirted with a triple - double to carry the team to a win , as he totaled 39 points , 12 rebounds , six assists and three steals in the win . Bismack Biyombo also played well , as he amassed 16 points and 12 rebounds en route to a double - double . On deck for the Nuggets is a matchup with the Portland Trail Blazers on Sunday . The Nuggets played this game without Tony Parker and that clearly hampered them here . Nikola Jokic was fantastic , as he scored a career - high 39 points , while also grabbing 12 rebounds . The Nuggets got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Clippers 37 - 25 right away in the first quarter . The Clippers were the superior shooters , going 51 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 44 percent from the floor and just 25 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets also out - rebounded the Clippers 53 - 38 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Nuggets were led by Jamal Murray in this game , as he went 10 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , while adding six rebounds and two assists as well . It was a new season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Nuggets , as he 's averaging just 15 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a triple - double , Nikola Jokic finished with 18 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) , 14 rebounds and two blocked shots , while playing just 20 minutes . It was a season - high in points for Harris , who had n't reached the 22 - point mark yet this season . Malik Beasley was the only other bench player in double figures . He finished with 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt ) , one rebound and five assists in 31 minutes . The only other Clippers player to reach double figures in points was Torrey , who also contributed 14 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt ) . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Clippers will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .

McCollum followed with a pair of 18 - point efforts . The former added three rebounds and three assists , while the latter pitched in with six rebounds , three assists and two steals . Morris pitched in with 12 points , a rebound and three steals . They 're home again on Wednesday night versus the New Orleans Pelicans .
The Denver Nuggets ( 30 - 14 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 10 - 35 ) 135 - 105 on Saturday . Denver came into this game as a rare road favorite and didn ’ t disappoint . The key for Denver was their rebounding , as they brought down 45 boards to the Bulls 45 . The Nuggets also shot lights out , as they went 52 percent from the field , 75 percent from the free - throw line and 50 percent from three - point range . The ball movement was huge as well , with Denver dishing out 34 assists to the Bulls eight . Chicago had to play this game in the second half of a back - to - back set and it was clear they couldn ’ t keep up in the altitude . The Bulls had a six - minute stretch in the fourth quarter where they failed to make a basket . Nikola Jokic recorded a double - double , as he collected 18 points and eight rebounds in the win . Jamal Murray also had a nice game off the bench , as he tallied 25 points , two rebounds and five assists in the defeat . This is a very talented team and they are still feared no matter how bad their record looks . The Nuggets have now won two - straight and they 'll look to add to that winning streak on Friday in a road matchup against the Indiana Pacers . The Nuggets have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and they came out of the All-Star break on a high note . They were led by a fantastic performance from Jamal Murray , who scored a season - high 25 points off the bench . Nikola Jokic was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 17 points and eight rebounds . Malik Beasley led the bench with 13 points , nine rebounds and four assists . On deck for the Nuggets is a matchup against the Oklahpma City Thunder on Tuesday .
The Denver Nuggets ( 31 - 14 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 9 - 38 ) 124 - 102 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets were the better shooters in this game , going 56 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers went 49 percent from the floor and just 34 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets also out - rebounded the Cavaliers 43 - 28 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Nuggets were led by Jamal Murray in this game , as he went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 26 points , while also adding five rebounds over 25 minutes . It was a new season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Nuggets , as he 's averaging just 12 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a triple - double , Nikola Jokic finished with 19 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) , 11 rebounds and two blocked shots , while Jamal Murray posted an efficient 18 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and three assists in 27 minutes off the bench . The only other Cavalier to reach double - digit points was Malik Lyles , who chipped in 16 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , six rebounds and four assists . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Cavaliers will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Denver Nuggets ( 38 - 18 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 25 - 30 ) 103 - 87 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Nuggets got out quickly in this game , out - scoring the Heat 35 - 27 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Nuggets were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 43 percent from the three - point line , while the Heat went 41 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets were also able to force the Heat into 23 turnovers , while only committing 15 of their own . The Nuggets were led by the duo of Nikola Jokic and Nikola Jokic . Jokic shot 7 - for - 16 from the field and 3 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also recording 12 rebounds and four assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 44 points and 29 assists over his last two games . He 's also had a strong stretch of games , averaging 28 points and 7 assists over his last three games . Jokic , on the other hand , finished with 23 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) and four assists . He 's now averaging 17 points and 7 assists on the season . Dion Waiters was the only other starter in double figures , as he finished with 11 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) and six assists . For the Heat , Malik Beasley led the offensive effort for the Nuggets . He went 8 - for - 13 from the field and 5 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also adding a pair of assists in 28 minutes . It was a season - high in points for Beasley , who had n't reached the 21 - point mark yet this season . Justise Winslow also had a solid showing , posting 15 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , four rebounds and two steals . It was his second straight night with 15 points , despite averaging only 9 points per game on the season . Dion Waiters chipped in with 11 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) and six assists as well . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Heat will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Denver Nuggets ( 42 - 18 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 38 - 22 ) 121 - 112 at FedEx Forum on Wednesday . Nikola Jokic suffered a broken tibia in his right leg and was unable to return to the game after playing just 18 minutes . He disagreed with a clear - path foul call and argued with the referees until they levied two technical fouls against him with just seven seconds left before halftime . In Millsap 's absence , he led all scorers for Denver , posting 36 points on 11 - of - 25 shooting . He also added nine rebounds and seven assists in 40 minutes of play . Nikola Jokic posted a double - double of 15 points and 5 rebounds in 30 minutes , and Paul Millsap had 12 points , 10 rebounds , one assist , two steals , one block and four three - pointers in 40 minutes . Steven Adams was the only other Thunder player to score in double figures , tallying 15 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting , five rebounds , and two assists in 30 minutes . Isaiah Thomas scored a team - high 20 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting to go along with five assists and five rebounds in 33 minutes off the bench . Malik Grant led the starters with 21 points , five rebounds , three assists and two blocks in 34 minutes . The Nuggets shot 47 percent from the field and gave up 18 turnovers as a team . They will return home to host the Houston Rockets on Monday .

He 's been one of the few bright spots in the loss of the Jazz , as he 's averaged 15 points per game over his last three outings . The game was a testament to the perseverance and marksmanship of the visiting Pelicans , who shook off a 39 - 27 first - quarter explosion by the Nuggets on the strength of a pair of standout efforts from their two best players , and a highly balanced offensive effort from their starting five . All five members of the first unit managed double - digit scoring , and the Pelicans shot 49 percent from the field overall , which helped them overcome 21 turnovers . They head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Saturday night .

He 's really stepped it up following the All-Star break , averaging 19 points and 9 rebounds over his last three games . Up next , the Pelicans will stay home Wednesday to take on the Grizzlies , while the Kings will head home Wednesday to play the Pelicans .
The Los Angeles Lakers ( 35 - 42 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 32 - 46 ) 130 - 102 on Wednesday . Los Angeles came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldn ’ t hold off a bad Lakers team . The key for Los Angeles was their shooting , as they shot 48 percent from the field , 86 percent from the free - throw line and 39 percent from three - point range . The Lakers shot just 46 percent from the field and 39 percent from long distance . This game was well out of hand early and mismatches like this are ugly to watch for NBA fans . The Lakers are a revived team as of late and it directly correlates with the addition of Reggie Rondo , who scored 24 points and grabbed three boards in the loss . Rajon Rondo continued his good form , as he tallied 24 points , five rebounds and 12 assists in the victory . Los Angeles has a few days off until they play the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday in their next game . The Lakers played this game without superstar Anthony Davis and it clearly hurt them late . Rajon Rondo did all he could though , as he scored a team - high 24 points and dished out 12 assists in the loss . Julius Randle also played well , as he tallied 17 points , five rebounds and three assists in the defeat . All five starters scored in double - figures , but they need more from their bench if they are to have any success this season . The Pelicans will play the Sacramento Kings in their next game on Monday .

Especially New Orleans , as they shot 44 percent from the field and 27 percent from three - point range . They also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 58 boards to the Pelicans 42 . This marks the third - straight loss for the Pelicans and skeptics wonder if this is regression finally hitting this surprise team . He also got to the free - throw line 10 times and hit 6 - of - 10 from the free - throw line . Miami has won four straight games , and while the wins have come during an easy part of their schedule ( Sixers , Jazz , Nuggets , Pistons ) , the talking heads have tried to fit the narrative of Lance Stephenson ( groin ) sitting out as the reason for the Pistons ' success . Stephenson has missed the last four games , coinciding with the Pistons ' resurgence , and while they have no doubt played remarkably better of late , putting all the blame on one player is misleading . The Pistons had a solid game shooting the ball , as they shot 39 percent from the field and 26 percent from long range . The Pistons dominated the game from start to finish with Andre Drummond leading the way to victory . Enes Kanter posted a double - double of 20 points and 15 rebounds in 34 minutes , and Maurice Harkless ( 10 ) was the only other player to score in double figures . The win gives the Pistons their fourth straight win and extends their lead in the Western Conference over the Grizzlies to 8 games . The Toronto Raptors ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 0 - 1 ) 116 - 104 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Toronto . At the end of the third quarter , the Raptors were able to outscore the Cavaliers 26 - 29 to secure the victory . The Raptors shot 49 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers shot 40 percent from the floor and 37 percent from beyond the arc . The Raptors were led by the duo of Kyle Lowry and Kawhi Leonard . Lowry had a game - high of 27 points ( 10 - 12 FG , 5 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , while also handing out eight assists . He was able to get to the free throw line at will , and converted on 2 - of - 3 attempts . He 's now averaging 22 points and 5 assists on the season . Love on the other hand went 5 - for - 18 from the floor and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding seven rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 36 points and 10 rebounds over his last two games . George Hill did n't have his best shooting performance , as he went 5 - for - 11 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 15 points , while also adding two rebounds and seven assists . The only other Cavalier to reach double - digit points was Pascal Siakam , who recorded a double - double with 17 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and 10 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , combining for 35 points and 29 rebounds over those two games . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , while the Cavaliers will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 2 - 0 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 1 - 1 ) 113 - 101 on Wednesday at Time Warner Cable Arena in Toronto . Despite being out - rebounded 49 - 41 by the Raptors , the Raptors were the superior shooters , going 47 percent from the field and 37 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 40 percent from the floor and a meager 39 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Raptors forced the Celtics into 14 turnovers , while committing just 12 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Raptors received most of their production from Kyrie Irving and Serge Ibaka . Leonard went 10 - for - 25 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding 10 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 12 rebounds over his last two games . Irving , on the other hand , posted 21 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) , six assists and four rebounds . He had a very poor showing in Friday 's game against the Pacers , shooting just 22 percent ( 1 - 14 FG ) from the field , so it was good to see him get back on track Sunday . Replacing Pascal Siakam in the starting lineup , Jaylen Brown had 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) and four rebounds off the bench . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Celtics will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Houston Rockets defeated the Washington Wizards 136 - 118 Monday at Toyota Center . The final score of Wednesday 's contest suggests the game was a lot closer than it actually was , as while the team entered halftime tied up at 88 points each , the Rockets ( 16 - 14 ) elected to run away with the game in the third quarter , outscoring the Wizards ( 12 - 20 ) by 6 - 12 in the period . James Harden led the way for the Rockets with a game - high 35 points on 10 - of - 18 shooting , nine assists and three rebounds in 34 minutes . Bradley Beal was n't far behind , scoring 16 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting in 31 minutes as a reserve . As a team , it was a very strong shooting night for Houston , as they shot 55 percent from the field overall and 47 percent from behind the arc . For the Wizards , it was a night to forget , with only three players managing to score in double figures . Sam Dekker led the way with 15 points in 15 minutes off the bench , while Clint Capela put together a nice all - around game with 20 points , 12 rebounds and one steal in 35 minutes . As a team , it was a night to forget for Washington , as they shot just over 54 percent from the field and a poor 6 - of - 29 ( 33 percent ) from behind the arc . Up next , the Rockets will head home Thursday to take on the 76ers , while the Wizards will look to turn things around Friday against the Bucks .

The Hornets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 29 - 30 in the first quarter alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 28 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 52 percent from the floor and just 40 percent from beyond the arc . The Hornets also out - rebounded the Suns 46 - 36 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Suns were led by T.J. Warren , who went 9 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 23 points , while adding five rebounds and five assists as well . It was a new season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Hornets , as he 's averaging just 12 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a triple - double , Deandre Ayton had a triple - double in the victory . He finished with 19 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) , nine rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's now pushed his season averages to 12 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Both Marvin Williams and Jamal Crawford reached double figures in points as well . Williams finished with 20 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and five assists , while Crawford posted 16 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and two assists . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Suns will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Phoenix Suns ( 10 - 32 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 20 - 21 ) 115 - 111 on Tuesday at the Staples Center in Sacramento . The Suns were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 48 percent from the floor and just 52 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns also out - rebounded the Kings 37 - 43 , giving them even more of an advantage . Coming off the bench , Kelly Oubre Jr. was the biggest contributor , going 9 - for - 15 from the field and 5 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 26 points , while adding five rebounds as well . It was a new season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Suns , as he 's averaging only 11 points per game so far this season . Willie Cauley-Stein also had a successful showing , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 8 FT ) and seven rebounds . It was far - and - away his best game since joining the Kings at the trade deadline . Over his last four games , he 's averaging 31 points , as he 's had the hot hand lately . Ayton on the other hand shot 9 - for - 19 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also grabbing four rebounds . It was the most points he 's had in the last four games , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Also , in a surprise performance off the bench , Ben McLemore shot 7 - for - 10 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 20 points . He had only reached double figures three other times this season , so it was good to see him turn things around . Richaun Holmes added 12 points ( 4 - 4 FG , 0 - 0 FT ) , four rebounds and three steals off the bench , while Richaun Holmes added 12 points ( 4 - 4 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and four rebounds in 18 minutes . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Kings will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Phoenix Suns ( 11 - 33 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 28 - 13 ) 102 - 93 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Phoenix . The Suns got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 31 - 23 in the first quarter alone . The Suns were the superior shooters in this game , going 41 percent from the field and 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets went just 39 percent from the floor and a meager 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns also out - rebounded the Nuggets 49 - 50 , giving them even more of an advantage and helping push them to the victory on the road . It was the duo of Nikola Jokic and Nikola Jokic who helped keep the Nuggets in the game . Jokic finished with 23 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 6 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) and 10 rebounds , while Jokic posted 23 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) and 10 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 34 points and 21 rebounds over his last two games . The Suns also received some solid contributions from their bench . Jamal Murray recorded 12 points ( 4 - 17 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and nine rebounds as well , while Richaun Holmes chipped in with 14 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and seven rebounds . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Nuggets will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 23 - 24 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 11 - 38 ) 118 - 91 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Timberwolves got out to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Suns 32 - 27 right away in the first quarter . The Suns were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 43 percent from the floor and just 21 percent from beyond the arc . The Timberwolves also secured a 64 - 34 rebounding advantage , only furthering their dominance in this one . The Timberwolves were led by the duo of Karl-Anthony Towns and Josh Okogie . Jackson went 10 - for - 18 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 27 points , while adding 10 rebounds and three assists as well . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so it was good to see him turn things around . Andrew Wiggins added 17 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) of his own . He was able to get to the free throw line 9 times , and converted on 5 - of - 9 . Coming just shy of a double - double , Karl-Anthony Towns recorded 25 points ( 10 - 15 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) and 18 rebounds and Wiggins had 17 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and nine rebounds . Jerryd Bayless came off the bench to score 14 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 4 - 11 3Pt ) in 28 minutes . The Timberwolves ' next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday , while the Suns will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 30 - 20 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 11 - 39 ) 120 - 106 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers came out firing in this one , out - scoring the Suns 30 - 31 in the first quarter alone . The Blazers were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 46 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 41 percent from the floor and just 34 percent from beyond the arc . The Trail Blazers also forced the Suns into 16 turnovers , while only committing 16 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Trail Blazers were led by the duo of Damian Lillard and Devin Booker . Lillard shot 7 - for - 16 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding three rebounds , three assists and two steals . He was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate , as he converted on nine of those attempts . Coming just shy of a double - double , Damian Lillard posted 24 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 9 - 9 FT ) , while also handing out three assists . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 41 points and 16 assists over his last two games . The Blazers received a huge contribution from the bench in this one . CJ McCollum shot 8 - for - 15 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding three rebounds and two steals . He 's combined for 39 points over his last two games , so it was a step in the right direction for him . Notching a double - double was Jusuf Nurkic , who came off the bench for 16 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 3 - 0 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , nine rebounds and two blocked shots . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday , while the Suns will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday .

The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 33 - 30 in the first quarter alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 47 percent from the floor and 38 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks were also able to force the Suns into 24 turnovers , while only committing 24 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 67 points and 43 rebounds over his last two games . Jackson , on the other hand , went 10 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding two assists over 37 minutes . Josh Jackson had a strong showing of his own , scoring 25 points ( 10 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 9 FT ) and two steals in 37 minutes . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Suns will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Wednesday .

The Golden State Warriors ( 39 - 15 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 11 - 46 ) 117 - 107 on Friday . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled for the first three quarters . Golden State shot 51 percent from the field and 34 percent from three - point range , while the Warriors shot just 39 percent from the field and 19 percent from long distance . This game was well out of hand early and mismatches like this are ugly to watch for NBA fans . Not many teams can keep up with Golden State and especially not the Suns . The Warriors blitzed them in the first quarter and then hit them even harder coming out after the half time . Klay Thompson was the star of the show , as he scored 25 fourth quarter points en route to a 25 - point , seven - rebound , seven - assist performance . Kelly Oubre Jr. was a great spark off the bench , as he tallied 25 points , 12 rebounds and three steals in the win . This was a tough task for the Suns and they 'll look to keep up this form against the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday . The Warriors have been a bit of a disappointment this season and this loss only adds to those struggles . Kelly Oubre Jr. led the team in scoring , as he scored a season - high 25 points on 9 - for - 19 shooting . Draymond Green flirted with a triple - double , as he accumulated 13 points , four rebounds and three assists . Josh Jackson scored just 19 points , but dished out five assists in the win . Up next for the Warriors is a rivalry game against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 28 - 36 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 12 - 51 ) 130 - 116 on Monday . The high - scoring affair was a testament to the reigning NBA champs ' ability to pull out a victory in almost any style of game . While the Pelicans were able to escape with a hard - fought victory over the Suns , the Pelicans had all five of their starters manage double - digit scoring and were led by Julius Randle , who posted a near double - double with 22 points , nine rebounds , three assists and a block . Jrue Holiday was the only other member of the starting five to manage double - digit scoring , finishing with 21 points , five rebounds , nine assists and a pair of steals . Cheick Diallo pitched in with his second consecutive double - digit scoring game , amassing 15 points , 11 boards , an assist and a pair of steals . Richaun Holmes , garnering some extra minutes off the bench with all of the injuries in the frontcourt , paced the Suns ' bench with 20 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals . The Suns fell to 12 - 51 and remain in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division . They now head to Minnesota for a Wednesday showdown versus the Timberwolves . Phoenix 's starting five enjoyed a highly productive night , and were encouragingly led by a resurgent effort from All-Star Anthony Davis , who managed 17 points , eight rebounds , three assists , two steals and three blocks . Jrue Holiday was right behind him with a 21 - point , nine - rebound , nine - assist effort that also included a pair of steals . Cheick Diallo pitched in with 15 points and 11 rebounds of his own , along with two steals and a block . Richaun Holmes , garnering some extra minutes off the bench with all of the injuries in the frontcourt , paced the reserves with 10 points , four rebounds , an assist , two steals and a block . The Suns fell to 12 - 51 and remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They head to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Wednesday .

The Suns were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 23 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 48 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns also out - rebounded the Lakers 41 - 40 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Suns were led by Brandon Ingram , who went 10 - for - 19 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 25 points , while also adding seven rebounds and six assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 53 points and 40 rebounds over his last two games . Devin Booker had a strong showing as well . He went 8 - for - 18 from the field and 0 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding four rebounds and four assists . It was a nice bounce back game for him after scoring only five points against the Clippers on Sunday . Kelly Oubre Jr. was the only other Nugget to reach double figures in points , finishing with 14 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 0 3Pt ) and five rebounds . The Suns saw most of their production from LeBron James , who posted a game - high of 27 points ( 10 - 21 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 3 - 7 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds and 16 assists . He 's been absolutely phenomenal throughout the whole second half of this season and he continues to put all the pressure on his own shoulders here in the final stretch , as he 's averaging a ridiculous 35 points and 10 rebounds over his last three . Devin Booker was also a big factor in the win . He finished with 25 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt , 9 - 9 FT ) and four rebounds , while Josh Jackson had 16 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and two assists off the bench . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday .

The shooting was terrible from both teams , as they both shot 49 percent from the field . The difference for the suns was the play of their starters , as they outscored the Pelicans starters 80 - 31 . In fact , yes that total in the first half , the Suns just got into a high scoring total . Ray Spalding recorded a double - double off the bench , as he totaled 21 points and 0 - for - 0 from three - point range . Ian Diallo recorded a double - double off the bench as well , totaling 12 points and 11 rebounds in the defeat . The Pelicans will look to build off this win when they take on the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday in the second half of a back - to - back . New Orleans came into this game as a seven - point underdog and rode their bench to a win . Elfrid Payton also played well , accumulating 14 points , five rebounds and 12 assists . The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 2 - 4 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 4 - 3 ) 128 - 110 on Friday . This was a one - point game going into the final quarter , but the Thunder pulled away by winning the fourth quarter 35 - 33 in a dominating performance . The Thunder shot 51 percent from the field , while holding the Clippers to 47 percent shooting . The Thunder also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 41 boards to the Clippers 38 . The three - point shooting was key for Oklahoma City , as they went 10 - for - 33 from long distance . The Thunder have been playing competitively lately , but this was not one of those games . The Thunder were the superior shooters in this one , going 44 percent from the field and 24 percent from the three - point line , while the Rockets finished at 38 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 38 points and 16 rebounds over his last two games . Dennis Schroder was another big contributor in the loss . He shot 6 - for - 12 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 14 points , while also handing out five assists . He was able to get to the free throw line eight times and converted on a perfect 2 - of - 2 . Coming just shy of a double - double , Dennis Schroder finished with 14 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , six rebounds and five assists . He 's averaging only 9 points on the year , so it was a nice surprise for the Rockets . The only other player to reach double figures in points was PJ Grant , who came off the bench for 10 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) and two rebounds . The Thunder 's next game will be at home against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Rockets will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday .

Along with the quick start , the Thunder also won the shooting , rebounding and assisting differentials . Both teams shot similar percentages , as the Thunder went 35 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went 44 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder also out - rebounded the Grizzlies 53 - 44 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Thunder were led by Avery Bradley , who shot 11 - for - 19 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding five assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 58 points and 35 rebounds over his last two games . Schroder , on the other hand , went 6 - for - 22 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 27 points , while also adding six assists and two steals . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so it was good to see him turn things around . Dennis Schroder had a solid showing of his own , finishing with 17 points ( 6 - 22 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , six assists and two steals . While it was slightly less than his season scoring average , he just did n't have to do that much , as Bradley gets a lot of help off the bench . Dennis Schroder had a strong showing , posting 17 points ( 6 - 22 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , six assists and two steals in 41 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of two games , combining for 44 points and 22 rebounds over that span . Dennis Schroder did n't have his best night offensively , finishing with only 17 points ( 6 - 22 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , while also adding six assists in 41 minutes . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of January , so it was good to see him come back and get a full games worth of work without any setbacks . Abdel a season - high point guard added 17 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and 12 rebounds as well , giving him his second double - double in a row . He 's now averaging 10 points and 3 rebounds on the season . Delon Wright had a strong showing as well , recording 17 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , six assists and two steals in 36 minutes . The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 42 - 26 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 36 - 34 ) 108 - 96 on Sunday . The game was a tale of two halves , with Brooklyn jumping out to a 19 - point lead after the first quarter and never looking back . The Thunder won the second quarter 38 - 25 , and outscored them by a 58 - 30 margin over the third and fourth periods . The game was tied at the end of the first quarter , with Oklahoma City 's largest lead coming by the end of the third quarter and that set the tone for the final three quarters . Russell Westbrook led the way for the Thunder with a 31 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included a pair of rebounds , a pair of steals and a block . Steven Adams followed with a double - double of his own , posting 13 points , seven rebounds , an assist , two steals and a block . Joe Harris pitched in with 13 points , six rebounds , two assists and a block . Joe Harris led the bench with 13 points , six rebounds and two assists . Spencer Dinwiddie was productive as a reserve as well with eight points , six rebounds and four assists . Spencer Dinwiddie led the way for Brooklyn with 25 points , five rebounds , two assists and a block . Jerami Grant was next with 15 points , seven rebounds and a block . D'Angelo Russell supplied 14 points , seven assists , four rebounds and three steals . Joe Harris led the bench with 13 points , six rebounds , two assists and a block . Brooklyn remains in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Monday night .
The Golden State Warriors ( 47 - 21 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 42 - 28 ) 110 - 88 on Monday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Thunder 40 - 27 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 43 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 32 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Warriors also out - rebounded the Thunder 53 - 52 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson . Curry went 10 - for - 23 from the field and 5 - for - 12 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 33 points , while also adding seven rebounds and three assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 33 points and 33 rebounds over his last two games . Thompson on the other hand went 9 - for - 21 from the field and 3 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while adding eight rebounds and four assists as well . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so it was good to see him turn things around . Dennis Thompson had a strong showing as well . He finished with 23 points ( 9 - 21 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , eight rebounds and four assists in 28 minutes . He 's now pushed his season averages to 16 points and 10 rebounds on the year . The Warriors ' next game will be at home against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Thunder will be at home against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday .

The Heat came out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Thunder 27 - 25 right away in the first quarter . They were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 44 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . Dragic shot 9 - for - 17 from the field , but only 4 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 26 points . He was able to get to the free throw line eight times , and converted on nine - of - 9 attempts . It was a nice bounce back game for him after scoring only six points against the Nets on Saturday . Kelly Olynyk chipped in with 18 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and nine rebounds , notching his second double - double in as many games with the Heat . The Heat 's next game will be on the road against the Indiana Pacers on Tuesday , while the Thunder will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 44 - 31 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 45 - 30 ) 107 - 99 on Sunday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder got off to a quick start , out - scoring the Pacers 29 - 27 right away in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Thunder also shot the ball well , going 55 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Pacers went 43 percent from the floor and just 42 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder also secured a 44 - 45 rebounding advantage , helping push them to a convincing 26 - point victory . The Thunder 's backcourt of Paul George and Bojan Bogdanovic did most of the damage to the Thunder . George went 12 - for - 25 from the field and 4 - for - 13 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding four rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 55 points and 15 rebounds over his last two games . Bogdanovic , on the other hand , went 11 - for - 20 from the field and 6 - for - 9 from beyond the arc to score 28 points . It was a season - high in points for Bogdanovic , who had n't reached double figures yet this year . Russell Westbrook also did his part , finishing with 17 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , 11 rebounds and 12 assists in 37 minutes . He 's now pushed his season averages to 11 points and 4 assists on the year . Both Myles Turner and Thaddeus Young reached double figures in points as well . Turner recorded 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and five rebounds , while Young had 11 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and five rebounds . The Thunder 's next game will be on the road against the Boston Celtics on Friday , while the Pacers will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Friday .
