In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled for the first three quarters . Dallas shot 43 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range in the win . They also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 52 boards to the Wolves 49 . This marks the third - straight loss for the Thunder and skeptics wonder if this is regression finally hitting this surprise team . Russell Westbrook had another great game , as he tallied 25 points , 11 rebounds and 11 assists in the defeat . Trey Burke also had a nice game off the bench , as he tallied 25 points , two rebounds and eight assists in the defeat . This is a very talented team and they are still feared no matter how bad their record looks . The Mavericks have now won two - straight and they 'll look to add to that winning streak on Wednesday in a road matchup with the Dallas Mavericks . The Mavericks have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and they came out of the All-Star break on a high note . They were led by a fantastic performance from Russell Westbrook , who tallied 25 points , 11 assists and 11 rebounds in the win . Steven Adams also had a nice game , as he totaled 11 points , nine rebounds and four blocks in the defeat . The Thunder will look to build off this win when they take on the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday in the second half of a back - to - back set .

The Blazers were led by Lillard 's 21 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds and a pair of assists . Enes Kanter was next with a 20 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and four blocks . Damian Lillard supplied 15 points , five rebounds and a pair of assists . Gorgui Dieng was the only other player to tally double - digit scoring , supplying 18 points , four rebounds , two assists and a steal . Jerryd Bayless paced the reserves with 19 points , two assists and a pair of rebounds . The Blazers improved to 49 - 28 and remain atop the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They head to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Monday . Portland was led by Hood 's 21 points , which he supplemented with seven rebounds , four assists and a steal . Andrew Wiggins was right behind him with 21 points , seven rebounds , four assists and a steal . Dario Saric was next with a bench - leading 18 points , which he supplemented with 11 rebounds , an assist and four blocks . Karl-Anthony Towns contributed a 17 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and two blocks . Al-Farouq Aminu rounded out a successful night for the starting five with nine points , six rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block . The Timberwolves remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They 're home against the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night .
The Miami Heat ( 38 - 41 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 36 - 43 ) 109 - 111 on Friday . The entertaining back - and - forth affair featured solid ball security from both clubs , as well as stellar offensive performances on each side . Dwyane Wade led Miami with 24 points , three assists , three rebounds and a steal over 29 minutes , his fourth double - double in the last four games . The remaining three members of the first unit all managed double digits in the scoring column as well , as they managed to shoot 51 percent from the field overall . They also held the Timberwolves to 50 percent shooting from the field and an impressive 33 percent from three - point range . Miami was led by Dwyane Wade 's 24 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds , three assists and a steal . Dario Saric was next with a bench - leading 19 points , which he supplemented with seven rebounds and five assists . Andrew Wiggins followed with 18 points , two rebounds , an assist and a steal . Justise Winslow contributed 13 points , seven rebounds , four assists , a steal and a block . Tyus Jones and James Johnson pitched in with a pair of 12 - point efforts , with the former adding six assists , six rebounds and a pair of steals , and the latter hauling in six boards and dishing out four assists . The Heat are currently in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and slotted in the sixth seed in the conference as well . They 're home again on Monday night versus the Atlanta Hawks .
The Toronto Raptors ( 58 - 24 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 36 - 45 ) 120 - 100 on Sunday at the Amway Center in Minnesota . The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 26 - 28 right away in the first quarter . They were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 43 percent from the three - point line , while the Timberwolves went 42 percent from the floor and a meager 31 percent from beyond the arc . The Raptors were also able to force the Timberwolves into 31 turnovers , while only committing 18 of their own . The Raptors were led by the duo of Kawhi Leonard and Kawhi Leonard . Leonard finished with a team - high of 20 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt ) , while adding six rebounds and a blocked shot over 24 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 57 points and 19 rebounds over his last two games . Fred VanVleet was also a huge factor in the win , posting 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , four assists and three steals . Considering he 's averaging 16 points on the year , it was a nice suprise for the Timberwolves despite the loss . Coming just shy of a double - double , Chris Boucher went 7 - for - 17 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while adding three assists . He 's now averaging 12 points and 5 assists on the season . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points was Pascal Siakam , who contributed 10 points and four rebounds . The Timberwolves ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday , while the Timberwolves will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 0 - 1 ) 128 - 119 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Going into halftime tied at 45 , it looked as if this was going to be a grind - it - out , close finish . Instead , the Trail Blazers took control in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the Lakers 28 - 28 to secure the four - point victory on the road . The Blazers were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 48 percent from the floor and just 23 percent from beyond the arc . The Blazers were led by Damian Lillard , who shot 9 - for - 21 from the field , but 2 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding six rebounds , four assists and a steal . He was able to get to the free throw line eight times , and converted on 8 - of - 8 attempts . It was a nice bounce back game for him after scoring only nine points against the Clippers on Sunday . Jusuf Nurkic chipped in with 16 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and nine rebounds as well . The only other Lakers player to reach double figures was JaVale McGee , who came off the bench for 13 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and eight rebounds . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Utah Jazz on Friday .

Considering he 's averaging 10 points on the year , it was a nice surprise for the Pelicans to get this kind of production . Staying extremely consistent so far this season , Jusuf Nurkic did n't dissapoint . He finished with 20 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds , three assists and two blocked shots , as he did a little bit of everything Tuesday . Also , coming off the bench , Evan Turner had arguably his best game of the year , as he recorded 14 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and eight rebounds . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Pelicans will be at home against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday .
The Los Angeles Lakers ( 4 - 5 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 6 - 3 ) 114 - 110 on Saturday . Los Angeles has won five straight games , and while the wins have come during an easy part of their schedule ( Sixers , Jazz , Nuggets , Lakers ) , the talking heads have tried to fit the narrative of Lance Stephenson ( groin ) sitting out as the reason for the Lakers ' success . Stephenson has missed the last four games , coinciding with the Lakers ' resurgence , and while they have no doubt played remarkably better of late , putting all the blame on one player is misleading . Damian Lillard led the way with the team , putting up a team - high 30 points in 36 minutes . Rajon Rondo posted a double - double with 17 points and 6 assists . He also had six rebounds and six assists . JaVale McGee was a force off the bench as punishment for missing the bus to Friday 's shootaround . Aminu had four points and eight rebounds in 32 minutes off the bench . Lance Stephenson ( knee ) is expected to miss at least another two weeks with a stress fracture in his foot . C.J . McCollum played a team - high 36 minutes and finished with seven points , four rebounds and three assists . The Trail Blazers will go on the road to face the Denver Nuggets on Sunday . Portland has dropped two straight games . They shot a woeful 52 percent from the field and 38 percent from beyond the arc to decimate the Trail Blazers ' defense . He also recorded eight rebounds , giving him his second double - double of the season . Often criticized for his shooting , it was good to see him shoot over 50 percent from the field for the fourth time over his last six games . The Portland Trail Blazers ( 27 - 19 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 9 - 36 ) 129 - 112 on Monday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . After ending the third quarter down 74 - 73 , the Trail Blazers went off in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the Cavaliers 29 - 27 to secure the four - point victory on the road . The Blazers were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 55 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers went 47 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Trail Blazers were led by the duo of Damian Lillard and CJ McCollum . Lillard shot 11 - for - 19 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 33 points , while also adding six rebounds and six assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 58 points and 32 rebounds over his last two games . McCollum on the other hand shot 7 - for - 13 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also handing out a season - high of 1 assists . The 18 points were a season - high for him , and it marked his seventh double - double of the season . Rodney Hood was the only other Cavalier in double figures , scoring 20 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) of his own , to go along with four rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's picked it up offensively of late , averaging 24 points over his last five games . The only other Cavalier to reach double - digit points was Zach Aminu , who came off the bench for 11 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 17 minutes . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Cavaliers will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 28 - 19 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 21 - 25 ) 128 - 112 on Wednesday night . The final scoreline indicates a double - digit win , but the game was close throughout . In fact , there were eight ties and 20 lead changes in total , as neither team led by more than seven points . Portland was lights - out with their jumpers , shooting 47 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range . The Blazers shot 47 percent from the field and 32 percent from long distance . This game was well out of hand early and mismatches like this are ugly to watch for NBA fans . Not many teams can keep up with Portland and they didn ’ t do enough to win . The biggest difference in the game was the shooting , as the Trail Blazers shot 47 percent while the Pelicans shot just 49 percent . The Pelicans had a nightmare of a game in a nightmare season . Not only did the Blazers play this game , they played some of their best games of the season . In fact , Damian Lillard scored 24 points on 8 - of - 20 shooting , while dishing out eight assists . C.J . McCollum was the only other player who scored more than 12 , as he scored 20 points in just 18 minutes . The Blazers will look to build off this win when they take on the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday in the second half of a back - to - back set .

The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hawks 40 - 30 in the first quarter alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 37 percent from the three - point line , while the Hawks went 46 percent from the floor and 36 percent from beyond the arc . He went 10 - for - 23 from the field and 2 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 28 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and a pair of assists in 32 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of two games , combining for 44 points and 12 rebounds over that span . John Collins matched McCollum as the Blazers really struggled to get anything going . Aminu was very efficient in his debut , scoring 22 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 4 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and grabbed three rebounds in 32 minutes . It was a season - high in points for Curry and a nice surprise for the Trail Blazers , as he 's only averaging 10 points per game on the season . Jusuf Nurkic recorded a double - double of his own , finishing with 15 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) and nine rebounds . The only other Hornet to reach double - digit points was Jeremy Lin , who came off the bench for 10 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 21 minutes . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , while the Hawks will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday .

They were superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Hawks went 42 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Wizards were also able to force the Hawks into 26 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this one . The Wizards were led by Bradley Beal , who went 9 - for - 20 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 24 points , while also adding four rebounds and six assists . It was a new season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Wizards , as he 's averaging only 14 points per game so far this season . Alex Len also had a strong showing , finishing with 24 points ( 11 - 19 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and 11 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 36 points and 17 rebounds over his last two games . Tomas Valnciunas was another big factor in the win . He went 7 - for - 13 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 22 points , to go along with six rebounds in 36 minutes . He 's now averaging 22 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , DeAndre' Bembry added 11 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds , while DeAndre' notching 11 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) and 11 rebounds . The Wizards saw a big game from Bradley Beal , who went 9 - for - 20 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 24 points , while also adding four rebounds and six assists . He 's now averaging 14 points and 5 rebounds on the season . Bryant on the other hand went 9 - for - 7 from the field and a perfect 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding a pair of assists . It was a nice bounce back game for him after scoring only five points against the Nets on Sunday . Tomas Satoransky recorded a double - double off the bench , with 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) and seven assists . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , while the Hawks will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .
The Washington Wizards ( 18 - 25 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 29 - 12 ) 113 - 106 on Monday at the Air Canada Centre in Washington . The Wizards got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bucks 40 - 26 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 55 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went 45 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Wizards also out - rebounded the Bucks 43 - 43 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Wizards were led by Bradley Beal , who came off the bench to score 25 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , while also adding eight rebounds and a steal . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 39 points and 39 rebounds over his last two games . Eric Bledsoe had a strong showing as well . He went 7 - for - 21 from the field and 2 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while adding nine assists . He struggled to only four points on 4 - of - 11 shooting from the field in Sunday 's game against the Spurs , so it was good to see him turn things around . Malcolm Brogdon had a double - double of his own with 15 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and eight assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 39 points and 15 rebounds over his last two games . The Wizards received some solid contributions from their bench . Tomas Satoransky recorded a double - double with 18 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 12 assists as well , while Trevor Ariza had 20 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 6 - 12 3Pt ) and 3 rebounds . The 18 points were a season - high for him , while the double - double was his second in a row . Coming off the bench , Tomas Satoransky added a double - double of his own , as he posted 18 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 2 - 0 3Pt ) and 12 rebounds . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Bucks will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 33 - 12 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 18 - 26 ) 140 - 138 in overtime on Saturday . Toronto has won two of their last three games as they continue to experiment with their latest starting lineup that includes Kyle Bryant at point guard and Tomas Satoransky in the starting lineup . Otto Porter got the start at power forward , putting up a team - high 27 points to go with eight rebounds and seven assists in 48 minutes . Six players scored in double digits for the Raptors , including Otto Porter , who put up 27 points and eight rebounds in 44 minutes off the bench . They 'll return home to host the Boston Celtics on Saturday . Washington has lost two straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Wizards will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Wizards have the right guys to build a winning team around . Bradley Beal led the way for the first time in four games this season , recording a career - high 43 points to go along with 10 rebounds , three assists , three steals and two blocks in 55 minutes . Bradley Beal shot 17 - of - 36 from the field , including 6 - of - 12 from beyond the arc , finishing with 27 points and eight rebounds in 44 minutes . Washington will go on the road to face the Denver Nuggets on Saturday .

It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 56 points and 19 rebounds over his last two games . He 's had a nice stretch of two games , combining for 44 points and 12 rebounds over that span . Thomas received some help from Otto Porter though , who posted 19 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and four rebounds in 26 minutes . The Washington Wizards ( 29 - 39 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 31 - 38 ) in the season finale Wednesday at Verizon Center , 100 - 90 . The Magic jumped out to a 29 - 28 lead after the first quarter and never looked back , as the lead reached as many as 32 points in the third quarter . The Wizards slowly chipped away at the lead , whittling it down to single digits with under three minutes to play . A Nikola Vucevic three - pointer put the Wizards up one with two seconds to go , but Thomas answered back with a three - pointer of his own to put the game out of reach . Vucevic finished with 20 points , 14 rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Bradley Beal led the Wizards in scoring with 23 points ( 10 - 22 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , along with six assists and six rebounds . Beal shot 10 - 22 from the field , including 4 - 6 from deep . D.J . Augustin was huge off the bench as he poured in 16 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt ) , along with one rebound and seven assists , in 21 minutes off the bench . Thomas Bryant led the Magic in scoring with 21 points ( 9 - 12 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , along with seven assists , nine rebounds and two steals , in 39 minutes . D.J . Augustin finished with 16 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt ) , one rebound and seven assists , in 21 minutes off the bench . All five starters scored in double digits for the Wizards , led by Jabari Parker , who finished with 19 points ( 9 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , nine rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 28 minutes . D.J . Augustin tallied 16 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt ) , one rebound and seven assists , in 21 minutes off the bench . All five starters scored in double digits for the Wizards , including Jabari Parker , who led the way in scoring for the Magic , with 19 points ( 9 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , along with nine rebounds , one assist and one block , in 25 minutes . Nikola Vucevic tallied a double - double with 20 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 14 rebounds , along with two assists , one steal and one block , in 35 minutes . This was tight throughout , as there were eight ties and 9 lead changes , with no team leading by more than 14 points . Dion Waiters was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 16 points , three rebounds and three assists . It was a game where neither team had much to play for , as the Bulls are locked in as the No . 2 seed in the Eastern Conference , with just a half - game lead over Chicago for the eighth spot . The Wizards were the ones on their heels through the second half , but it was too little , too late . In fact , the Bulls outscored the Wizards 30 - 30 in the third quarter to seal the win . The Bulls shot 53 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range in the win . They also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 49 boards to the Wizards 39 . Washington has been throttling teams , but this was easily their worst offensive performance of the year . No player scored more than 19 points and the starters combined for just 29 points . JaKarr Sampson was a nice spark off the bench too , as he tallied 18 points and nine rebounds off the bench .
